earth brought forth grass herb yielding seed kind tree yielding fruit whose seed wa kind god saw wa good evening morning third day god said let light firmament heaven divide day night let sign season day year let light firmament heaven give light upon earth wa god made two great light greater light rule day lesser light rule night made star also god set firmament heaven give light upon earth rule day night divide light darkness god saw wa good evening morning fourth day god said let water bring forth abundantly moving creature hath life fowl may fly earth open firmament heaven god created great whale every living creature moveth water brought forth abundantly kind every winged fowl kind god saw wa good god blessed saying fruitful multiply fill water sea let fowl multiply earth evening morning fifth day god said let earth bring forth living creature kind cattle creeping thing beast earth kind wa god made beast earth kind cattle kind every thing creepeth upon earth kind god saw wa good god said let u make man image likeness let dominion fish sea fowl air cattle earth every creeping thing creepeth upon earth god created man image image god created male female created god blessed lord god made earth heaven every plant field wa earth every herb field grew lord god caused rain upon earth wa man till ground went mist earth watered whole face ground lord god formed man dust ground man leave father mother shall cleave unto wife shall one flesh naked man wife ashamed serpent wa subtil beast field lord god made said unto woman yea hath god said ye shall eat every tree garden woman said unto serpent may eat fruit tree garden fruit tree midst garden god hath said ye shall eat neither shall ye touch lest ye die serpent said unto woman ye shall surely die god doth know day ye eat thereof eye shall opened ye shall god knowing good evil woman saw tree wa good food wa pleasant eye tree desired make one wise took fruit thereof eat gave also unto husband eat eye opened knew naked done woman said serpent beguiled eat lord god said unto serpent thou hast done thou art cursed cattle every beast field upon thy belly shalt thou go dust shalt thou eat day thy life put enmity thee meal knead make cake upon hearth abraham ran unto herd fetcht calf tender good gave unto young man hasted dress took butter milk calf dressed set stood tree eat said unto sarah thy wife said behold tent said certainly return unto thee according time life lo sarah thy wife shall son sarah heard tent door wa behind abraham sarah old well stricken age ceased sarah manner woman therefore sarah laughed within saying waxed old shall pleasure lord old also lord said unto abraham wherefore sarah laugh saying shall surety bear child old thing hard lord time appointed return unto thee according time life sarah shall son sarah denied saying laughed wa afraid said nay thou didst laugh men rose thence looked toward sodom abraham went bring way lord said shall hide abraham thing seeing abraham shall surely become great mighty nation nation earth shall blessed know command child household shall keep way lord justice judgment lord may bring upon abraham hath spoken lord said cry sodom gomorrah great sin grievous go see whether done altogether according cry come unto know men turned face thence went toward sodom abraham stood yet lord abraham drew near said wilt thou also destroy righteous wicked peradventure fifty righteous within city wilt thou also destroy spare place fifty righteous therein far thee manner slay righteous wicked righteous wicked far thee shall judge earth right lord said find sodom fifty righteous within city spare place sake abraham answered said behold taken upon speak unto lord dust ash peradventure shall lack five fifty righteous wilt thou destroy city lack five said find forty five destroy spake unto yet said peradventure shall forty found said forty sake said unto oh let lord angry speak peradventure shall thirty found said find thirty said people every quarter called unto lot said unto men came thee night bring unto u may know lot went door unto shut door said pray brother wickedly behold two daughter known man let pray bring unto ye pulled lot house shut door smote men door house blindness small great wearied find door men said unto lot hast thou besides son law thy son thy daughter whatsoever thou hast city bring place destroy place cry waxen great face lord lord hath sent u destroy lot went spake unto son law married daughter said get place lord destroy city seemed one mocked unto son law morning arose angel hastened lot saying arise take thy wife thy two daughter lest thou consumed iniquity city lingered men laid hold upon hand upon hand wife upon hand two daughter lord merciful unto brought forth set without city came pas brought forth abroad said escape thy life look behind thee neither stay thou plain escape mountain lest thou consumed lot said unto oh lord behold thy servant hath found grace thy sight thou hast magnified thy mercy thou hast shewed unto saving life cannot escape mountain lest evil take die behold city near flee unto little one oh let escape thither little one soul shall live said unto see accepted thee concerning thing also overthrow city thou hast spoken haste thee escape thither cannot anything till thou come thither therefore name city wa called zoar sun wa risen upon earth lot entered zoar lord rained upon sodom upon gomorrah brimstone fire lord heaven overthrew city plain inhabitant city grew upon ground wife looked back behind became pillar salt abraham gat early morning place stood lord looked toward sodom gomorrah toward land plain beheld lo smoke country went smoke furnace came pas god destroyed city plain god remembered abraham sent lot midst overthrow overthrew sister abimelech king gerar sent took sarah god came abimelech dream night said behold thou art dead man woman thou hast taken man wife abimelech come near said lord wilt thou slay also righteous nation said unto sister even said brother integrity heart innocency hand done god said unto dream yea know thou didst integrity thy heart also withheld thee sinning therefore suffered thee touch therefore restore man wife prophet shall pray thee thou shalt live thou restore know thou thou shalt surely die thou thine therefore abimelech rose early morning called servant told thing ear men sore way lord shall command blessing upon thee thy storehouse thou settest thine hand unto shall bless thee land lord thy god giveth thee lord shall establish thee holy people unto hath sworn unto thee thou shalt keep commandment lord thy god walk way people earth shall see thou art called name lord shall afraid thee lord shall make thee plenteous good fruit thy body fruit thy cattle fruit thy ground land lord sware unto thy father give thee lord shall open unto thee good treasure heaven give rain unto thy land season bless work thine hand thou shalt lend unto many nation thou shalt borrow thou goest posse lord shall smite thee consumption fever inflammation extreme burning sword blasting mildew shall pursue thee thou perish thy heaven thy head shall brass earth thee shall iron lord shall make rain thy land powder dust heaven shall come upon thee thou destroyed lord shall cause thee smitten thine enemy thou shalt go one way flee seven way shalt removed kingdom earth thy carcase shall meat unto fowl air unto beast earth man shall fray away lord smite thee botch egypt emerods scab itch whereof thou canst healed lord shall smite thee madness blindness astonishment heart thou shalt grope noonday blind gropeth darkness thou shalt prosper thy way thou shalt oppressed spoiled evermore man shall save thee thou shalt betroth wife another man shall lie thou shalt build house thou shalt dwell therein thou shalt plant vineyard shalt gather grape thereof thine ox shall slain thine eye thou shalt eat thereof thine shall violently taken away thy face shall restored thee thy sheep shall given unto thine enemy thou shalt none rescue thy son thy daughter shall given unto another people thine eye shall look fail longing day long shall might thine hand fruit thy land thy labour shall nation thou knowest eat thou shalt oppressed crushed alway thou shalt mad sight thine eye thou shalt see lord shall smite thee knee leg sore botch cannot healed sole thy foot unto top thy lord shall lead thee thou shalt carry much seed field shalt gather little locust shall consume thou shalt plant vineyard dress shalt neither drink wine gather grape worm shall eat thou shalt olive gerizim half mount ebal moses servant lord commanded bless people israel afterward read word law blessing cursings according written book law wa word moses commanded joshua read congregation israel woman little one stranger conversant among came pas king side jordan hill valley coast great sea lebanon hittite amorite canaanite perizzite hivite jebusite heard thereof gathered together fight joshua israel one accord inhabitant gibeon heard joshua done unto jericho ai work wilily went made ambassador took old sack upon ass wine bottle old rent bound old shoe clouted upon foot old garment upon bread provision wa dry mouldy went joshua unto camp gilgal said unto men israel come far country therefore make ye league u men israel said unto hivites peradventure ye dwell among u shall make league said unto joshua thy servant joshua said unto ye whence come ye said unto far country thy servant come name lord thy god heard fame egypt two king amorites beyond jordan sihon king heshbon og king bashan wa ashtaroth wherefore elder inhabitant country spake u saying take victual journey go meet say unto servant therefore make ye league u bread took hot provision house day came forth go unto behold dry mouldy bottle wine filled new behold rent garment shoe become old reason long journey men took victual asked counsel mouth lord joshua made peace made league let live prince congregation sware unto came pas end three day made league heard neighbour dwelt among child israel journeyed came unto city third day city gibeon chephirah beeroth kirjathjearim child israel smote prince congregation sworn unto lord god israel congregation murmured prince prince said unto congregation sworn unto lord god israel therefore may touch even let live lest wrath upon u oath sware unto prince said unto let live let hewer wood drawer water unto congregation prince promised joshua called spake unto saying wherefore ye beguiled u saying far ye dwell among u therefore ye cursed shall none freed bondman hewer wood drawer water house god answered joshua said wa certainly told thy servant lord thy god commanded servant moses give land destroy inhabitant land therefore sore afraid life done thing behold thine hand seemeth good right unto thee unto u unto delivered hand child israel slew joshua made day hewer wood drawer water congregation altar lord even unto day place choose came pas adonizedec king jerusalem heard joshua taken ai utterly destroyed done jericho king done ai king inhabitant gibeon made peace israel among feared greatly gibeon wa great city one royal city wa greater ai men thereof mighty wherefore adonizedec king jerusalem sent unto hoham king hebron unto piram king jarmuth unto japhia king lachish unto debir king eglon saying come unto help may smite gibeon hath made peace joshua child israel therefore five king amorites king jerusalem king hebron king jarmuth king lachish king eglon gathered together went host encamped gibeon made war men gibeon sent unto joshua camp gilgal saying slack thy hand thy servant come u quickly save u help u king amorites dwell mountain gathered together u joshua ascended gilgal people war mighty men valour lord said unto joshua fear delivered thine hand shall man stand thee joshua therefore came unto suddenly went gilgal night lord discomfited israel slew great slaughter gibeon chased along way goeth bethhoron smote azekah unto makkedah came pas fled israel going bethhoron lord cast great stone heaven upon unto azekah died died hailstone child israel slew sword spake joshua lord day lord delivered amorites child israel said sight israel sun stand thou still upon gibeon thou moon valley ajalon sun stood still moon stayed people avenged upon enemy written book jasher sun stood still midst heaven hasted go whole day wa day like lord hearkened unto voice man lord fought israel joshua returned israel unto camp gilgal five king fled hid cave makkedah wa told joshua saying five king found hid cave makkedah joshua said roll great stone upon mouth cave set men keep stay ye pursue enemy smite hindmost suffer enter city lord god hath delivered hand came pas joshua child israel made end slaying great slaughter till consumed rest remained entered fenced city people returned camp joshua makkedah peace none moved tongue child israel said joshua open mouth cave bring five king unto cave brought forth five king unto cave king jerusalem king hebron king jarmuth king lachish king eglon came pas brought king unto joshua joshua called men israel said unto captain men war went come near put foot upon neck king came near put foot upon neck joshua said unto fear dismayed strong good courage thus shall lord enemy ye fight afterward joshua smote slew hanged five tree hanging upon tree evening came pas time going sun joshua commanded took tree cast cave wherein hid laid great stone cave mouth remain day day joshua took makkedah smote edge sword king thereof utterly destroyed soul therein let none remain king makkedah unto king jericho joshua passed makkedah israel unto libnah fought libnah lord delivered also king thereof hand israel smote edge sword soul therein let none remain unto king thereof unto king jericho joshua passed libnah israel unto lachish encamped fought lord delivered lachish hand israel took second day smote edge sword soul therein according done libnah horam king gezer came help lachish joshua smote people left none remaining lachish joshua passed unto eglon israel encamped fought took day smote edge sword soul therein utterly destroyed day according done day following lord ye builded altar ye might rebel day lord iniquity peor little u cleansed day although wa plague congregation lord ye must turn away day following lord seeing ye rebel day lord morrow wroth whole congregation israel notwithstanding land possession unclean pas ye unto land possession lord wherein lord tabernacle dwelleth take possession among u rebel lord rebel u building altar beside altar lord god achan son zerah commit trespass accursed thing wrath fell congregation israel man perished alone iniquity child reuben child gad half tribe manasseh answered said unto head thousand israel lord god god lord god god knoweth israel shall know rebellion transgression lord save u day built u altar turn following lord offer thereon burnt offering meat offering offer peace offering thereon let lord require rather done fear thing saying time come child might speak unto child saying ye lord god israel lord hath made jordan border u ye child reuben child gad ye part lord shall child make child cease fearing lord therefore said let u prepare build u altar burnt offering sacrifice may witness u generation u might service lord burnt offering sacrifice peace offering among nation remain among neither make mention name god cause swear neither serve bow unto cleave unto lord god ye done unto day lord hath driven great nation strong man hath able stand unto day one know certainty lord god drive nation shall snare trap unto scourge side thorn eye ye perish good land lord god hath given behold day going way earth ye know heart soul one thing hath failed good thing also amalekites maonites oppress ye cried delivered hand yet ye forsaken served god wherefore deliver go cry unto god ye chosen let deliver time tribulation child israel said unto lord sinned thou unto u whatsoever seemeth good unto thee deliver u pray thee day put away strange god among served lord soul wa grieved misery israel child ammon gathered together encamped gilead child israel elder gilead ye hate expel father house ye come unto ye distress elder gilead said unto jephthah therefore turn thee thou mayest go u fight child ammon head inhabitant gilead jephthah said unto elder word lord mizpeh jephthah sent messenger unto king child ammon saying hast thou thou art come fight land king child ammon answered unto messenger jephthah israel took away land came egypt arnon even unto jabbok unto jordan therefore restore land peaceably jephthah sent messenger unto king child ammon said unto thus saith jephthah israel took away land moab land child ammon israel came egypt walked wilderness unto red sea came kadesh israel sent messenger unto king edom saying let pray thee pas thy land king edom would hearken thereto like manner sent unto king moab would consent israel abode kadesh went along wilderness compassed land edom land moab came east side land moab pitched side arnon came within border moab arnon wa border moab israel sent messenger unto sihon king amorites king heshbon israel said unto let u pas pray thee thy land place sihon trusted israel pas coast sihon gathered people together pitched jahaz fought israel lord god israel delivered sihon people hand israel smote israel possessed land amorites inhabitant country possessed coast amorites arnon even unto jabbok wilderness even unto jordan lord god israel hath dispossessed amorites people israel shouldest thou posse wilt thou posse chemosh thy god giveth thee posse whomsoever lord god shall drive u posse art thou thing better balak son zippor king moab ever strive israel ever fight israel dwelt heshbon town aroer town city along coast arnon three hundred year therefore ye recover within time wherefore sinned thee thou doest wrong war lord judge judge day child israel child ammon howbeit king child ammon hearkened unto word jephthah sent spirit lord came upon jephthah passed gilead manasseh passed mizpeh gilead mizpeh gilead passed unto child ammon jephthah vowed vow unto lord said thou shalt without fail deliver child ammon mine hand shall whatsoever cometh forth door house meet return peace child ammon shall surely lord offer burnt offering jephthah passed unto child ammon fight lord delivered hand smote aroer even till thou come minnith even twenty city unto plain vineyard great slaughter thus child ammon subdued child israel jephthah came mizpeh unto house behold daughter came meet timbrel dance wa child beside neither son daughter came pas saw rent clothes said ala daughter thou hast brought low thou art one trouble opened mouth unto lord cannot go back said unto father thou hast opened thy mouth unto lord according hath proceeded thy mouth forasmuch lord hath taken vengeance thee thine enemy even child ammon said unto father let thing done let alone two month may go upon mountain bewail virginity fellow said go sent away two month went companion bewailed virginity upon mountain came pas end two month returned unto father according vow vowed consume thine eye grieve thine heart increase thine house shall die flower age shall sign unto thee shall come upon thy two son hophni phinehas one day shall die raise faithful priest shall according mine heart mind build sure house shall walk mine anointed ever shall come pas every one left thine house shall come crouch piece silver morsel bread shall say put pray thee one priest office may eat piece bread child samuel ministered unto lord eli word lord wa precious day wa open vision came pas time eli wa laid place eye began wax dim could see ere lamp god went temple lord ark god wa samuel wa laid sleep lord called samuel answered ran unto eli said thou calledst said called lie went lay lord called yet samuel samuel arose went eli said thou didst call answered called son lie samuel yet know lord neither wa word lord yet revealed unto lord called samuel third time arose went eli said thou didst call eli perceived lord called child therefore eli said unto samuel go lie shall call thee thou shalt say speak lord thy servant heareth samuel went lay place lord came stood called time samuel samuel samuel answered speak thy servant heareth lord said samuel behold thing israel ear every philistine taketh away reproach israel uncircumcised philistine defy army living god people answered manner saying shall done man killeth eliab eldest brother heard spake unto men eliab anger wa kindled david said camest thou hither hast thou left sheep wilderness know thy pride naughtiness thine heart thou art come thou mightest see battle david said done cause turned toward another spake manner people answered former manner word heard david spake rehearsed saul sent david said saul let man heart fail thy servant go fight philistine saul said david thou art able go philistine fight thou art youth man war youth david said unto saul thy servant kept father sheep came lion bear took lamb flock went smote delivered mouth arose caught beard smote slew thy servant slew lion bear put shepherd bag even scrip sling wa hand drew near philistine philistine came drew near unto david man bare shield went philistine looked saw david disdained wa youth ruddy fair countenance philistine said unto david dog thou comest stave philistine cursed david god philistine said david come give thy flesh unto fowl air beast field said david philistine thou comest sword spear shield god israel assembly shall know lord saveth sword spear battle lord give hand came pas philistine arose came drew nigh meet david david hastened ran toward army meet philistine david put hand bag took thence stone slang smote philistine forehead stone sunk forehead fell upon face earth david prevailed philistine sling stone smote philistine slew wa sword hand david therefore david ran stood upon philistine took sword drew sheath thereof slew cut head therewith philistine saw champion wa dead fled men israel judah arose shouted pursued philistine thou come valley gate ekron wounded philistine fell way shaaraim even unto gath unto ekron child israel returned chasing philistine spoiled tent david took head philistine brought jerusalem put armour tent saul saw david go forth philistine said unto abner captain host abner whose son youth abner said thy soul liveth king cannot tell king said enquire thou whose son stripling david returned slaughter philistine abner took brought saul head philistine hand saul said whose son art thou thou young man david answered son thy servant jesse bethlehemite came pas made end speaking unto saul soul jonathan wa knit soul david jonathan loved soul saul took day would let go home father house jonathan david made covenant loved soul jonathan stripped robe wa upon gave david garment even sword bow girdle david went whithersoever saul sent behaved wisely saul set men war wa accepted sight people also sight saul servant came pas came david wa returned slaughter philistine woman came city israel singing dancing meet king saul tabrets joy instrument musick woman answered one another played said saul hath slain thousand david ten thousand saul wa wroth saying displeased said ascribed unto david ten thousand ascribed thousand kingdom saul eyed david day forward came pas morrow evil spirit god came upon saul prophesied midst house david played hand time wa javelin saul hand saul cast javelin said smite david even wall david avoided presence twice saul wa afraid david lord wa wa departed saul therefore saul removed made captain thousand went came people david behaved wisely way lord wa wherefore saul saw behaved wisely wa afraid life father family israel son law king came pas time merab saul daughter given david wa given unto adriel meholathite wife michal saul daughter loved david told saul thing pleased saul said give may snare hand philistine may wherefore saul said david thou shalt day son law one twain saul commanded servant saying commune david secretly say behold king hath delight thee servant love thee therefore king son law saul servant spake word ear david david said seemeth light thing king son law seeing poor man lightly esteemed servant saul told saying manner spake david saul said thus shall ye say david king desireth dowry hundred foreskin philistine avenged king enemy saul thought make david fall hand philistine servant told david word pleased david well king son law day expired wherefore david arose went men slew philistine two hundred men david brought foreskin gave full tale king might king son law saul gave michal daughter wife saul saw knew lord wa david michal saul daughter loved father field thou art commune father thee see tell thee jonathan spake good david unto saul father said unto let king sin servant david hath sinned thee work thee ward good put life hand slew strengthened ye valiant master saul dead also house judah anointed king abner son ner captain saul host took ishbosheth son saul brought mahanaim made king gilead ashurites jezreel ephraim benjamin israel ishbosheth saul son wa forty year old began reign israel reigned two year house judah followed david time david wa king hebron house judah wa seven year six month abner son ner servant ishbosheth son saul went mahanaim gibeon joab son zeruiah servant david went met together pool gibeon sat one one side pool side pool abner said joab let young men arise play u joab said let arise arose went number twelve benjamin pertained ishbosheth son saul twelve servant david caught every one fellow head thrust sword fellow side fell together wherefore place wa called helkathhazzurim gibeon wa sore battle day abner wa beaten men israel servant david three son zeruiah joab abishai asahel asahel wa light foot wild roe asahel pursued abner going turned right hand left following abner abner looked behind said art thou asahel answered abner said turn thee aside thy right hand thy left lay thee hold one young men take thee armour asahel would turn aside following abner said asahel turn thee aside following wherefore smite thee ground hold face joab thy brother howbeit refused turn aside wherefore abner hinder end spear smote fifth rib spear came behind fell died place came pas many came place asahel fell died stood still joab also abishai pursued abner sun went come hill ammah lieth giah way wilderness gibeon child benjamin gathered together abner became one troop stood top hill abner called joab said shall sword devour ever knowest thou bitterness latter end long shall ere thou bid people return following brother joab said god liveth unless thou hadst spoken surely morning people gone every one following brother joab blew trumpet people stood still pursued israel neither fought abner men walked night plain passed jordan went bithron came mahanaim joab returned following abner gathered people together lacked david servant nineteen men asahel servant david smitten benjamin abner men three hundred threescore men died took asahel buried sepulchre father wa bethlehem joab men went night came hebron break day wa long war house saul house david david waxed stronger stronger house saul waxed weaker weaker unto david son born hebron firstborn wa amnon said day whosoever getteth gutter smiteth jebusites lame blind hated david soul shall chief captain wherefore said blind lame shall come house david dwelt fort called city david david built round presence said absalom ahithophel give counsel among shall ahithophel said unto absalom go unto thy father concubine hath left keep house israel shall hear thou art abhorred thy father shall hand thee strong spread absalom tent upon top house absalom went unto father concubine sight israel counsel ahithophel counselled day wa man enquired oracle god wa counsel ahithophel david absalom moreover returned people shall peace saying pleased absalom well elder israel said absalom call hushai archite also let u hear likewise saith hushai wa come absalom absalom spake unto saying ahithophel hath spoken manner shall saying speak thou hushai said unto absalom counsel ahithophel hath given good time said hushai thou knowest thy father men mighty men chafed mind bear robbed whelp field thy father rehoboam saying thy father made yoke grievous therefore make thou grievous service thy father heavy yoke put upon u lighter serve thee said unto depart yet three day come people departed king rehoboam consulted old men stood solomon father yet lived said ye advise may answer people spake unto saying thou wilt servant unto people day wilt serve answer speak good word thy servant ever forsook counsel morning bread flesh evening drank brook came pas brook dried rain land word lord came unto saying arise get thee zarephath belongeth zidon dwell behold commanded widow woman sustain thee arose went zarephath came gate city behold widow woman wa gathering stick called said fetch pray thee little water vessel may drink wa going fetch called said bring pray thee morsel bread thine hand said lord thy god liveth cake handful meal barrel little oil cruse behold gathering two stick may go dress son may eat die elijah said unto fear go thou hast said make thereof little cake first bring unto make thee thy son thus saith lord god israel barrel meal shall waste neither shall cruse oil fail day lord sendeth rain upon earth went according saying elijah house eat many day barrel meal wasted neither cruse oil fail according word lord spake elijah came pas thing son woman mistress house fell sick sickness wa sore wa breath left said unto elijah thee thou man god art thou come unto call sin remembrance slay son said unto give thy son took bosom carried loft abode laid upon bed cried unto lord said lord god hast thou also brought evil upon widow sojourn slaying son stretched upon child son liveth woman said elijah know thou art man god word lord thy mouth truth came pas many day word lord came elijah third year saying go shew thyself unto ahab send rain upon earth elijah went shew unto ahab wa sore famine samaria ahab called obadiah wa governor house obadiah feared lord greatly wa jezebel cut prophet lord obadiah took hundred prophet hid fifty cave fed bread water ahab said shall slay elijah said lord host liveth stand surely shew unto day obadiah went meet ahab told ahab went meet elijah came pas ahab saw elijah ahab said unto art thou troubleth israel answered troubled benhadad king syria gathered host together thirty two king horse chariot went besieged samaria warred sent messenger ahab king israel city said unto thus saith benhadad thy silver thy gold mine thy wife also thy child even goodliest mine king israel answered said lord king according thy saying thine messenger came said thus speaketh benhadad saying although sent unto thee saying thou shalt deliver thy silver thy gold thy wife thy child yet send servant unto thee morrow time shall search thine house house thy servant shall whatsoever pleasant thine eye shall put hand take away king soon thou art departed lion shall slay thee soon wa departed lion found slew found another man said smite pray thee man smote smiting wounded prophet departed waited king way disguised ash upon face king passed cried unto king said thy servant went midst battle behold man turned aside brought man unto said keep man mean missing shall thy life life else thou shalt pay talent silver thy servant wa busy wa gone king israel said unto shall thy judgment thyself hast decided hasted took ash away face king israel discerned wa prophet said unto thus saith lord thou hast let go thy hand man appointed utter destruction therefore thy life shall go life thy people people king israel went house heavy displeased came samaria came pas thing naboth jezreelite vineyard wa jezreel hard palace ahab king sad thou eatest bread said unto spake unto naboth jezreelite said unto give thy vineyard money else please thee give thee another vineyard answered give thee vineyard jezebel wife said unto dost thou god israel according father done first book king commonly called fourth book king moab rebelled israel death ahab ahaziah fell lattice upper chamber wa samaria wa sick sent messenger said unto go saith lord thou shalt come bed thou art gone shalt surely die elijah departed messenger turned back unto said unto ye turned back said unto came man meet u said unto u go turn unto king sent say unto thus saith lord god israel thou sendest enquire baalzebub god ekron therefore thou shalt come bed thou art gone shalt surely die said unto manner man wa came meet told word answered wa hairy man girt girdle leather loin said elijah tishbite king sent unto captain fifty fifty went behold sat top hill spake unto thou man god king hath said come elijah answered said captain fifty man god let fire come heaven consume thee thy fifty came fire heaven consumed fifty also sent unto another captain fifty fifty answered said unto man god thus hath king said come quickly elijah answered said unto man god let fire come heaven consume thee thy fifty fire god came heaven consumed fifty sent captain third fifty fifty third captain fifty went came fell knee elijah besought said unto man god pray thee word lord elijah spoken jehoram reigned stead second year jehoram son jehoshaphat king judah son rest act ahaziah written book chronicle king israel came pas lord would take elijah heaven whirlwind jericho son prophet jericho came elisha said unto knowest thou lord take away thy master thy head day answered yea know hold ye peace elijah said unto tarry pray thee lord hath sent jordan said lord liveth thy soul liveth leave thee two went fifty men son prophet went stood view afar two stood jordan elijah took mantle wrapped together smote water divided hither thither two went dry ground came pas gone elijah said unto elisha ask shall thee taken away thee elisha said pray thee let double portion thy spirit upon said thou hast asked hard thing nevertheless thou see taken thee shall unto thee shall came pas still went talked behold appeared chariot fire horse fire parted asunder elijah went whirlwind heaven elisha saw cried father father chariot israel horseman thereof saw took hold clothes rent two piece took also mantle elijah fell went back stood bank jordan took mantle elijah fell smote water said lord god elijah also smitten water parted hither thither elisha went son prophet view jericho saw said spirit elijah doth rest elisha came meet bowed ground said unto behold thy servant fifty strong men let go pray thee seek thy master lest peradventure spirit lord hath taken cast upon mountain valley said ye shall send urged till wa ashamed said send sent therefore fifty men sought three day found came tarried jericho said unto say unto go men city said unto elisha behold pray thee situation city pleasant lord seeth water naught ground barren said bring new cruse put salt therein brought went forth unto spring water cast salt said thus saith lord healed water shall thence death barren land water healed unto day according saying elisha spake went thence unto bethel wa going way came forth little child city mocked said unto go thou bald head go thou bald head turned back looked cursed name lord came forth two bear wood tare forty two child went thence mount carmel thence returned samaria jehoram son ahab began reign israel samaria eighteenth year jehoshaphat king judah reigned twelve year wrought evil sight lord like father like mother put away image baal father made nevertheless cleaved unto sin jeroboam son nebat made israel sin departed therefrom mesha king moab wa sheepmaster rendered unto king israel hundred thousand lamb hundred thousand ram wool came pas ahab wa dead king moab rebelled king israel king jehoram went samaria time numbered israel went sent jehoshaphat king judah saying king moab hath rebelled wilt thou go moab battle said go thou art people thy people horse thy horse said way shall go answered way wilderness edom king israel went king judah king edom fetched compass seven day journey wa water host cattle followed king israel said ala lord hath called three king together deliver hand moab jehoshaphat said prophet lord may enquire lord one king israel servant answered said elisha son shaphat poured water hand elijah jehoshaphat said word lord king israel jehoshaphat king edom went elisha said unto king israel thee get thee prophet thy father prophet thy mother king israel said unto nay lord hath called three king together deliver hand moab elisha said lord host liveth stand surely regard presence jehoshaphat king judah would look toward thee see thee bring minstrel came pas minstrel played hand lord came upon said thus saith lord make valley full ditch thus saith lord ye shall see wind neither shall ye see rain yet valley shall filled water ye may drink ye cattle beast light thing sight lord deliver moabites also hand ye shall smite every fenced city every choice city shall fell every good tree stop well water mar every good piece land stone came pas morning meat offering wa offered behold came water way edom country wa filled water moabites heard king come fight gathered able put armour upward stood border rose early morning sun shone upon water moabites saw water side red blood said blood king surely slain smitten one another therefore moab spoil came camp israel israelite rose smote moabites fled went forward smiting moabites even country beat city every good piece land cast every man stone filled stopped well water felled good tree kirharaseth left stone thereof howbeit slinger went smote king moab saw battle wa sore took seven hundred men drew sword break even unto king edom could took eldest son reigned stead offered burnt offering upon wall wa great indignation israel departed returned land cried certain woman wife son prophet unto elisha saying thy servant husband dead thou knowest thy servant fear lord creditor come take unto two son bondman elisha said unto shall thee tell hast thou house said thine handmaid hath thing house save pot oil said go borrow thee vessel abroad thy neighbour even empty vessel borrow thou art come thou shalt shut door upon thee upon thy son shalt pour vessel thou shalt set aside full went shut door upon upon son brought vessel poured came pas vessel full said unto son bring yet vessel said unto vessel oil stayed came told man god said go sell oil pay thy debt live thou thy child rest fell day elisha passed shunem wa great woman constrained eat bread wa oft passed turned thither eat bread said unto husband behold perceive holy man god passeth u continually let u make little chamber pray thee wall let u set bed table stool candlestick shall cometh u shall turn thither fell day came thither turned chamber lay said gehazi servant call shunammite called stood said unto say unto behold thou hast careful u care done thee wouldest thou spoken king captain host answered dwell among mine people said done gehazi answered verily hath child husband old said call called stood door said season according time life thou shalt embrace son said nay lord thou man god lie unto thine handmaid woman conceived bare son season elisha said unto according time life child wa grown fell day went father reaper said unto father head head said lad carry mother taken brought mother sat knee till noon died went laid bed man god shut door upon went called unto husband said send pray thee one young men one ass may run man god come said wherefore wilt thou go day neither new moon sabbath said shall well saddled said servant drive go forward slack thy riding except bid thee went came unto man god mount carmel came pas man god saw afar said gehazi servant behold yonder shunammite run pray thee meet say unto well thee well thy husband well child answered well came man god hill caught foot gehazi came near thrust away man god said let alone soul vexed within lord hath hid hath told said desire son lord say deceive said gehazi gird thy loin take staff thine hand go thy way thou meet man salute salute thee answer lay staff upon face child mother child said lord liveth thy soul liveth leave thee arose followed gehazi passed laid staff upon face child wa neither voice hearing wherefore went meet told saying child awaked elisha wa come house behold child wa dead laid upon bed went therefore shut door upon twain prayed unto lord went lay upon child put mouth upon mouth eye upon eye hand upon hand stretched upon child flesh child waxed warm returned walked house fro went stretched upon child sneezed seven time child opened eye called gehazi said call shunammite called wa come unto said take thy son went fell foot bowed ground took son went elisha came gilgal wa dearth land son prophet sitting said unto servant set great pot seethe pottage son prophet one went field gather herb found wild vine gathered thereof wild gourd lap full came shred pot pottage knew poured men eat came pas eating pottage cried said thou man god death pot could eat thereof said bring meal cast pot said pour people may eat wa harm pot came man baalshalisha brought man god bread firstfruits twenty loaf barley full ear corn husk thereof said give unto people may eat servitor said set hundred men said give people may eat thus saith lord shall eat shall leave thereof set eat left thereof according word lord naaman captain host king syria wa great man master honourable lord given deliverance unto syria wa also mighty man valour wa leper syrian gone company brought away captive land israel little maid waited naaman wife said unto mistress would god lord prophet samaria would recover leprosy one went told lord saying thus thus said maid land israel king syria said go go send letter unto king israel departed took ten talent silver six thousand piece gold ten change raiment brought letter king israel saying letter come unto thee behold therewith sent naaman servant thee thou mayest recover leprosy came pas king israel read letter rent clothes said god kill make alive man doth send unto recover man leprosy wherefore consider pray see seeketh quarrel wa elisha man god heard king israel rent clothes sent king saying wherefore hast thou rent thy clothes let come shall know prophet israel naaman came horse chariot stood door house elisha elisha sent messenger unto saying go wash jordan seven time thy flesh shall come thee thou shalt clean naaman wa wroth went away said behold thought surely come stand call name lord god strike hand place recover leper abana pharpar river damascus better water israel may wash clean turned went away rage servant came near spake unto said father prophet bid thee great thing wouldest thou done much rather saith thee wash clean went dipped seven time jordan according saying man god flesh came like unto flesh little child wa clean returned man god company came stood said behold know god earth israel therefore pray thee take blessing thy servant said lord liveth stand receive none urged take refused naaman said shall pray thee given thy servant two mule burden earth thy servant henceforth offer neither burnt offering sacrifice unto god unto lord thing lord pardon thy servant master goeth house rimmon worship leaneth hand bow house rimmon bow house rimmon lord pardon thy servant thing said unto go peace departed little way gehazi servant elisha man god said behold master hath spared naaman syrian receiving hand brought lord liveth run take somewhat gehazi followed naaman naaman saw running lighted chariot meet said well said well master hath sent saying behold even come mount ephraim two young men son prophet give pray thee talent silver two change garment naaman said content take two talent urged bound two talent silver two bag two change garment laid upon two servant bare came tower took hand bestowed house let men go departed went stood master elisha said unto whence comest thou gehazi said thy servant went whither said unto went mine heart thee man turned chariot meet thee time receive money receive garment oliveyards vineyard sheep ox manservant maidservant leprosy therefore naaman shall cleave unto thee unto thy seed ever went presence leper white snow son prophet said unto elisha behold place dwell thee strait u let u go pray thee unto jordan take thence every man beam let u make u place may dwell answered go ye one said content pray thee go thy servant answered go went came jordan cut wood one wa felling beam axe head fell water cried said ala master wa borrowed man god said fell shewed place cut stick cast thither iron swim therefore said take thee put hand took king syria warred israel took counsel servant saying place shall camp man god sent unto king israel saying beware thou pas place thither syrian come king israel sent place man god told warned saved twice therefore heart king syria wa sore troubled thing called servant said unto ye shew u king israel one servant said none lord king elisha prophet israel telleth king israel word thou speakest thy bedchamber said go spy may send fetch wa told saying behold dothan therefore sent thither horse chariot great host came night compassed city servant man god wa risen early gone forth behold host compassed city horse chariot servant said unto ala master shall answered fear u elisha prayed said lord pray thee open eye may see lord opened eye young man saw behold mountain wa full horse chariot fire round elisha came elisha prayed unto lord said smite people pray thee blindness smote blindness according word elisha elisha said unto way neither city follow bring man ye seek led samaria came pas come samaria elisha said lord open eye men may see lord opened eye saw behold midst samaria king israel said unto elisha saw father shall smite shall smite answered thou shalt smite wouldest thou smite thou hast taken captive thy sword thy bow set bread water may eat drink go master prepared great provision eaten drunk sent away went master band syria came land israel came pas benhadad king syria gathered host went besieged samaria wa great famine samaria behold besieged head wa sold fourscore piece silver fourth part cab dove dung five piece silver king israel wa passing upon wall cried woman unto saying help lord king said lord help thee whence shall help thee barnfloor winepress king said unto aileth thee answered woman said unto give thy son may eat day eat son morrow boiled son eat said unto next day give thy son may eat hath hid son came pas king heard word woman rent clothes passed upon wall people looked behold sackcloth within upon flesh said god also head elisha son shaphat shall stand day elisha sat house elder sat king sent man ere messenger came said elder see ye son murderer hath sent take away mine head look messenger cometh shut door hold fast door sound master foot behind yet talked behold messenger came unto said behold evil lord wait lord longer elisha said hear ye word lord thus saith lord morrow time shall measure fine flour sold shekel two measure barley shekel gate samaria lord whose hand king leaned answered man god said behold lord would make window heaven might thing said behold thou shalt see thine eye shalt eat thereof four leprous men entering gate said one another sit die say enter city famine city shall die sit still die also therefore come let u fall unto host syrian save u alive shall live kill u shall die rose twilight go unto camp syrian come uttermost part camp syria behold wa man lord made host syrian hear noise chariot noise horse even noise great host said one another lo king israel hath hired u king hittite king egyptian come upon u wherefore arose fled twilight left tent horse ass even camp wa fled life leper came uttermost part camp went one tent eat drink carried thence silver gold raiment went hid came entered another tent carried thence also went hid said one another well day day good tidings hold peace tarry till morning light mischief come upon u therefore come may go tell king household came called unto porter city told saying came camp syrian behold wa man neither voice man horse tied ass tied tent called porter told king house within king arose night said unto servant shew syrian done u know hungry therefore gone camp hide field saying come city shall catch alive get city one servant answered said let take pray thee five horse remain left city behold multitude israel left behold say even multitude israelite consumed let u send see took therefore two chariot horse king sent host syrian saying go see went unto jordan lo way wa full garment vessel syrian cast away haste messenger returned told king people went spoiled tent syrian measure fine flour wa sold shekel two measure barley shekel according word lord king appointed lord whose hand leaned charge gate people trode upon gate died man god said spake king came came pas man god spoken king saying two measure barley shekel measure fine flour shekel shall morrow time gate samaria lord answered man god said behold lord make window heaven might thing said behold thou shalt see thine eye shalt eat thereof fell unto people trode upon gate died spake man god went household sojourned land philistine seven year came pas seven year end woman returned land philistine went forth cry unto king house land king talked gehazi servant man god saying tell pray thee great thing elisha hath done came pas wa telling king restored dead body life behold woman whose son restored life cried king house land gehazi said lord king woman son elisha restored life king asked woman told king appointed unto certain officer saying restore wa fruit field since day left land even elisha came damascus benhadad king syria wa sick wa told saying man god come hither thy son benhadad king syria hath sent thee saying shall recover disease elisha said unto go say unto thou mayest certainly recover howbeit lord hath shewed shall surely die settled countenance stedfastly wa ashamed man god wept hazael said weepeth lord answered know evil thou wilt unto child israel strong hold wilt thou set fire young men wilt thou slay sword wilt dash child rip woman child therefore king assyria shut bound prison king assyria came throughout land went samaria besieged three year ninth year hoshea king assyria took samaria carried israel away assyria placed halah habor river gozan city medes wa child israel sinned lord god brought land egypt hand pharaoh king egypt feared god walked statute heathen lord cast child israel king israel made child israel secretly thing right lord god built high place city tower watchman fenced city set image grove every high hill every green tree burnt incense high place heathen lord carried away wrought wicked thing provoke lord anger served idol whereof lord said unto ye shall thing yet lord testified israel judah prophet seer saying turn ye evil way keep commandment statute according law commanded father sent servant prophet notwithstanding would hear hardened neck like neck father believe lord god rejected statute covenant made father testimony testified followed vanity became vain went heathen round concerning lord charged like left commandment lord god made molten image even two calf made grove worshipped host heaven served baal caused son daughter pas fire used divination enchantment sold evil sight lord provoke anger therefore lord wa angry israel removed sight wa none left tribe judah also judah kept commandment lord god walked statute israel made lord rejected seed israel afflicted delivered hand spoiler cast sight rent israel house david made jeroboam son nebat king jeroboam drave israel following lord made sin great sin child israel walked sin jeroboam departed lord removed israel sight said servant prophet wa israel carried away land assyria unto day king assyria brought men babylon cuthah ava hamath sepharvaim placed city samaria instead child israel possessed samaria dwelt city thereof wa beginning dwelling feared lord therefore lord sent lion among slew wherefore spake king assyria saying nation thou hast removed placed city samaria know manner god land therefore hath sent lion among behold slay know manner god land king assyria commanded saying carry thither one priest ye brought thence let go dwell let teach manner god land one priest carried away samaria came dwelt bethel taught fear lord howbeit every nation made god put house high place samaritan made every nation city wherein dwelt men babylon made succothbenoth men cuth made nergal men hamath made ashima avites made nibhaz tartak sepharvites burnt child fire adrammelech anammelech god sepharvaim feared lord made unto lowest priest high place sacrificed house high place feared lord served god manner nation carried away thence unto day former manner fear lord neither statute ordinance law commandment lord commanded child jacob named israel lord made covenant charged saying ye shall fear god bow serve sacrifice lord brought land egypt great power stretched arm shall ye fear shall ye worship shall ye sacrifice statute ordinance law commandment wrote ye shall observe evermore ye shall fear god covenant made ye shall forget neither shall ye fear god lord god ye shall fear shall deliver hand enemy howbeit hearken former manner nation feared lord served graven image child child child father unto day came pas third year hoshea son elah king israel hezekiah son ahaz king judah began reign twenty five year old wa began reign reigned twenty nine year jerusalem mother name also wa abi daughter zachariah wa right sight lord according david father removed high place brake image cut grove brake piece brasen serpent moses made unto day child israel burn incense called nehushtan trusted lord god israel wa none like among king judah clave lord departed following kept commandment lord commanded moses lord wa prospered whithersoever went forth rebelled king assyria served smote david thine heart god thee came pas night word god came nathan saying go tell david servant thus saith lord thou shalt build house dwell dwelt house since day brought israel unto day gone tent tent one tabernacle another wheresoever walked israel spake word judge israel commanded feed people saying ye built house cedar therefore thus shalt thou say unto servant david thus saith lord host took thee sheepcote even following sheep thou shouldest ruler people israel thee whithersoever thou hast walked cut thine enemy thee made thee name like name great men earth also ordain place people israel plant shall dwell place shall moved neither shall child wickedness waste beginning since time commanded judge people israel moreover subdue thine enemy furthermore tell thee lord build thee house shall come pas thy day expired thou must go thy father raise thy seed thee shall thy son establish kingdom shall build house stablish throne ever father shall son take mercy away took wa thee settle mine house kingdom ever throne shall established evermore according word according vision nathan speak unto david david king came sat lord said lord god mine house thou hast brought hitherto yet wa small thing thine eye god thou hast also spoken thy servant house great come hast regarded according estate man high degree lord god david speak thee honour thy servant thou knowest thy servant lord thy servant sake according thine heart hast thou done greatness making known great thing lord none like thee neither god beside thee according heard ear one nation earth like thy people israel god went redeem people make thee name greatness terribleness driving nation thy people thou hast redeemed egypt thy people israel didst thou make thine people ever thou lord becamest god therefore lord let thing thou hast spoken concerning thy servant concerning house established ever thou hast said let even established thy name may magnified ever saying lord host god israel even god israel let house david thy servant established thee thou god hast told thy servant thou wilt build house therefore thy servant hath found heart pray thee lord thou art god hast promised goodness unto thy servant therefore let please thee bless house thy servant may thee ever thou blessest lord shall blessed ever came pas david smote philistine subdued took gath town hand philistine smote moab moabites became david servant brought gift david smote hadarezer king zobah unto hamath went stablish dominion river euphrates david took thousand chariot seven thousand horseman twenty thousand footman david also houghed chariot horse reserved hundred chariot syrian damascus came help hadarezer king zobah david slew syrian two twenty thousand men david put garrison syriadamascus syrian became david servant brought gift thus lord preserved david whithersoever went david took shield gold servant hadarezer brought jerusalem likewise tibhath chun city hadarezer brought david much brass wherewith solomon made brasen sea pillar vessel brass tou king hamath heard david smitten host hadarezer king zobah sent hadoram son king david enquire welfare congratulate fought hadarezer smitten hadarezer war tou manner vessel gold silver brass also king david dedicated unto lord silver gold brought nation edom moab child ammon philistine amalek moreover abishai son zeruiah slew edomites valley salt eighteen thousand put garrison edom edomites became david servant thus lord preserved david whithersoever went david reigned israel executed judgment justice among people joab son zeruiah wa host jehoshaphat son ahilud recorder zadok son ahitub abimelech son abiathar priest shavsha wa scribe benaiah son jehoiada wa cherethites pelethites son david chief king came pas nahash king child ammon died son reigned stead david said shew kindness unto hanun son nahash father shewed kindness david sent messenger comfort concerning father servant david came land child ammon hanun comfort prince child ammon said hanun thinkest thou david doth honour thy father hath sent comforter unto thee servant come unto thee search overthrow spy land wherefore hanun took david servant shaved cut garment midst hard buttock sent away went certain told david men served sent meet men greatly ashamed king said tarry jericho beard grown return child ammon saw made odious david hanun child ammon sent thousand talent silver hire chariot horseman mesopotamia syriamaachah zobah hired thirty two thousand chariot king maachah people came pitched medeba child ammon gathered together city came battle david heard sent joab host mighty men child ammon came put battle array gate city king come field joab saw battle wa set behind chose choice israel put array syrian rest people delivered unto hand abishai brother set array child ammon said syrian strong thou shalt help child ammon strong thee help thee good courage let u behave valiantly people city god let lord good sight joab people drew nigh syrian unto battle fled child ammon saw syrian fled likewise fled abishai brother entered city joab came jerusalem syrian saw put worse israel sent messenger drew forth syrian beyond river shophach captain host hadarezer went wa told david gathered israel passed jordan came upon set battle array david put battle array syrian fought syrian fled israel david slew syrian seven thousand men fought chariot forty thousand footman killed shophach captain host servant hadarezer saw put worse israel made peace david became servant neither would syrian help child ammon came pas year wa expired time king go battle servitude thy father heavy yoke put upon u serve thee said unto come unto three day people departed king rehoboam took counsel old men stood solomon father yet lived saying counsel give ye return answer people spake unto saying thou kind people please speak good word thy servant ever forsook counsel old men gave took counsel young men brought stood said unto advice give ye may return answer people spoken saying ease somewhat yoke thy father put upon u young men brought spake unto saying thus shalt thou answer people spake unto thee saying thy father made yoke heavy make thou somewhat amaziah strengthened led forth people went valley salt smote child seir ten thousand ten thousand left alive child judah carry away captive brought unto top rock cast top rock broken piece soldier shebaniah pethahiah said stand bless lord god ever ever blessed thy glorious name exalted blessing praise thou even thou art lord alone thou hast made heaven heaven heaven host earth thing therein sea therein thou preservest host heaven worshippeth thee thou art lord god didst choose abram broughtest forth ur chaldee gavest name abraham foundest heart faithful thee madest covenant give land canaanite hittite amorites perizzites jebusites girgashites give say seed hast performed thy word thou art righteous didst see affliction father egypt heardest cry red sea shewedst sign wonder upon pharaoh servant people land thou knewest dealt proudly didst thou get thee name day thou didst divide sea went midst sea dry land persecutor thou threwest deep stone mighty water moreover thou leddest day cloudy pillar night pillar fire give light way wherein go thou camest also upon mount sinai spakest heaven gavest right judgment true law good statute commandment madest known unto thy holy sabbath commandedst precept statute law hand moses thy servant gavest bread heaven hunger broughtest forth water rock thirst promisedst go posse land thou hadst sworn give father dealt proudly hardened neck hearkened thy commandment refused obey neither mindful thy wonder thou didst among hardened neck rebellion appointed captain return bondage thou art god ready pardon gracious merciful slow anger great kindness forsookest yea made molten calf said thy god brought thee egypt wrought great provocation yet thou thy manifold mercy forsookest wilderness pillar cloud departed day lead way neither pillar fire night shew light way wherein go thou gavest also thy good spirit instruct withheldest thy manna mouth gavest water thirst yea forty year didst thou sustain wilderness lacked nothing clothes waxed old foot swelled moreover thou gavest kingdom nation didst divide corner possessed land sihon land king heshbon land og king bashan child also multipliedst thou star heaven broughtest land concerning thou hadst promised father go posse child went possessed land thou subduedst inhabitant land canaanite gavest hand king people land might would took strong city fat land possessed house full good well digged vineyard oliveyards fruit tree abundance eat filled became fat delighted thy great goodness nevertheless disobedient rebelled thee cast thy law behind back slew thy prophet testified turn thee wrought great provocation therefore thou deliveredst hand enemy vexed time trouble cried unto thee thou heardest heaven according thy manifold mercy thou gavest saviour saved hand enemy rest evil thee therefore leftest thou land enemy dominion yet returned cried unto thee thou heardest heaven many time didst thou deliver according thy mercy testifiedst thou mightest bring unto thy law yet dealt proudly hearkened unto thy commandment sinned thy judgment man shall live withdrew shoulder hardened neck would hear yet many year didst thou forbear testifiedst thy spirit thy prophet yet would give ear therefore gavest thou hand people land nevertheless thy great mercy sake thou didst utterly consume forsake thou art gracious merciful god therefore god great mighty terrible god keepest covenant mercy let trouble seem little thee hath come upon u king prince priest prophet father thy people since time king assyria unto day howbeit thou art brought upon u thou hast done right done wickedly neither king prince priest father kept thy law hearkened unto thy commandment thy testimony wherewith thou didst testify served thee kingdom thy great goodness thou gavest large fat land thou gavest neither turned wicked work behold servant day land thou gavest unto father eat fruit thereof good thereof behold servant yieldeth much increase unto king thou hast written book chronicle king medium persia mordecai jew wa next unto king ahasuerus great among jew accepted multitude brother seeking wealth people speaking peace seed book job wa man land uz whose name wa job man wa perfect upright one feared god eschewed evil born unto seven son three daughter substance also wa seven thousand sheep three thousand camel five hundred yoke ox five hundred ass great household man wa greatest men east son went feasted house every one day sent called three sister eat drink wa day feasting gone job sent sanctified rose early morning offered burnt offering according number job said may son sinned cursed god heart thus job continually wa day son god came present lord satan came also among lord said unto satan whence comest thou satan answered lord said going fro earth walking lord said unto satan hast thou considered servant job none like earth perfect upright man one feareth god escheweth evil satan answered lord said doth job fear god nought hast thou made hedge house hath every side thou hast blessed work hand substance increased land put forth thine hand touch hath curse thee thy face lord said unto satan behold hath thy power upon put forth thine hand satan went forth presence lord wa day son daughter eating drinking wine eldest brother house came messenger unto job said ox plowing ass feeding beside sabeans fell upon took away yea slain servant edge sword escaped alone tell thee wa yet speaking came also another said fire god fallen heaven hath burned sheep servant consumed escaped alone tell thee wa yet speaking came also another said chaldean made three band fell upon camel carried away yea slain servant edge sword escaped alone tell thee wa yet speaking came also another said thy son thy daughter eating drinking wine eldest brother house behold came great wind wilderness smote four corner house fell upon young men dead escaped alone tell thee job arose rent mantle shaved head fell upon ground worshipped said naked came mother womb naked shall return thither lord gave lord hath taken away blessed name lord job sinned charged god foolishly wa day son god came present lord satan came also among present lord lord said unto satan whence comest thou satan answered lord said going fro earth walking lord said unto satan hast thou considered servant job none like earth perfect upright man one feareth god escheweth evil still holdeth fast integrity although thou movedst destroy without cause satan answered lord said skin skin yea man hath give life put forth thine hand touch bone flesh curse thee thy face lord said unto satan behold thine hand save life went satan forth presence lord smote job sore boil sole foot unto crown took potsherd scrape withal sat among ash said wife unto dost thou still retain thine integrity curse god die said unto thou speakest one foolish woman speaketh shall receive good hand god shall receive evil job sin lip job three friend heard evil wa come upon came every one place eliphaz temanite bildad shuhite zophar naamathite made appointment together come mourn comfort lifted eye afar knew lifted voice wept rent every one mantle sprinkled dust upon head toward heaven sat upon ground seven day seven night none spake word unto saw grief wa great opened job mouth cursed day job spake said let day perish wherein wa born night wa said man child conceived let day darkness let god regard neither let light shine upon let darkness shadow death stain let cloud dwell upon let blackness day terrify night let darkness seize upon let joined unto day year let come number month lo let night solitary let joyful voice come therein let curse curse day ready raise mourning let star twilight thereof dark let look light none neither let see dawning day shut door mother womb hid sorrow mine eye died womb give ghost came belly knee prevent breast suck lain still quiet slept rest king counsellor earth build desolate place prince gold filled house silver hidden untimely birth infant never saw light wicked cease troubling weary rest prisoner rest together hear voice oppressor small great servant free master wherefore light given misery life unto bitter soul long death cometh dig hid treasure rejoice exceedingly glad find grave light given man whose way hid god hath hedged sighing cometh eat roaring poured like water thing greatly feared come upon wa afraid come unto wa safety neither rest neither wa quiet yet trouble came eliphaz temanite answered said assay commune thee wilt thou grieved withhold speaking behold thou hast instructed many thou hast strengthened weak hand thy word upholden wa falling thou hast strengthened feeble knee come upon thee thou faintest toucheth thee thou art troubled thy fear thy confidence thy hope uprightness thy way remember pray thee ever perished innocent righteous cut even seen plow iniquity sow wickedness reap blast god perish breath nostril consumed roaring lion voice fierce lion teeth young lion broken old lion perisheth lack prey stout lion whelp scattered abroad thing wa secretly brought mine ear received little thereof thought vision night deep sleep falleth men fear came upon trembling made bone shake spirit passed face hair flesh stood stood still could discern form thereof image wa mine eye wa silence heard voice saying shall mortal man god shall man pure maker behold put trust servant angel charged folly much le dwell house clay whose foundation dust crushed moth destroyed morning evening perish ever without regarding doth excellency go away die even without wisdom call answer thee saint wilt thou turn wrath killeth foolish man envy slayeth silly one seen foolish taking root suddenly cursed habitation child far safety crushed gate neither deliver whose harvest hungry eateth taketh even thorn robber swalloweth substance although affliction cometh forth dust neither doth trouble spring ground yet man born unto trouble spark fly upward would seek unto god unto god would commit cause doeth great thing unsearchable marvellous thing without number giveth rain upon earth sendeth water upon field set high low mourn may exalted safety disappointeth device crafty hand cannot perform enterprise taketh wise craftiness counsel froward carried headlong meet darkness day time grope noonday night saveth poor sword mouth hand mighty poor hath hope iniquity stoppeth mouth behold happy man god correcteth therefore despise thou chastening almighty maketh sore bindeth woundeth hand make whole shall deliver thee six trouble yea seven shall evil touch thee famine shall redeem thee death war power sword thou shalt hid scourge tongue neither shalt thou afraid destruction cometh destruction famine thou shalt laugh neither shalt thou afraid beast earth thou shalt league stone field beast field shall peace thee thou shalt know thy tabernacle shall peace thou shalt visit thy habitation shalt sin thou shalt know also thy seed shall great thine offspring grass earth thou shalt come thy grave full age like shock corn cometh season lo searched hear know thou thy good job answered said oh grief throughly weighed calamity laid balance together would heavier sand sea therefore word swallowed arrow almighty within poison whereof drinketh spirit terror god set array doth wild bray hath grass loweth ox fodder unsavoury eaten without salt taste white egg thing soul refused touch sorrowful meat oh might request god would grant thing long even would please god destroy would let loose hand cut yet comfort yea would harden sorrow let spare concealed word holy one strength hope mine end prolong life strength strength stone flesh brass help wisdom driven quite afflicted pity shewed friend forsaketh fear almighty brother dealt deceitfully brook stream brook pas away blackish reason ice wherein snow hid time wax warm vanish hot consumed place path way turned aside go nothing perish troop tema looked company sheba waited confounded hoped came thither ashamed ye nothing ye see casting afraid say bring unto give reward substance deliver enemy hand redeem hand mighty teach hold tongue cause understand wherein erred forcible right word doth arguing reprove ye imagine reprove word speech one desperate wind yea ye overwhelm fatherless ye dig pit friend therefore content look upon evident unto lie return pray let iniquity yea return righteousness iniquity tongue cannot taste discern perverse thing appointed time man upon earth day also like day hireling servant earnestly desireth shadow hireling looketh reward work made posse month vanity wearisome night appointed lie say shall arise night gone full tossings fro unto dawning day flesh clothed worm clod dust skin broken become loathsome day swifter weaver shuttle spent without hope remember life wind mine eye shall see good eye hath seen shall see thine eye upon cloud consumed vanisheth away goeth grave shall come shall return house neither shall place know therefore refrain mouth speak anguish spirit complain bitterness soul sea whale thou settest watch say bed shall comfort couch shall ease complaint thou scarest dream terrifiest vision soul chooseth strangling death rather life loathe would live alway let alone day vanity man thou shouldest magnify thou shouldest set thine heart upon thou shouldest visit every morning try every moment long wilt thou depart let alone till swallow spittle sinned shall unto thee thou preserver men hast thou set mark thee burden dost thou pardon transgression take away iniquity shall sleep dust thou shalt seek morning shall answered bildad shuhite said long wilt thou speak thing long shall word thy mouth like strong wind doth god pervert judgment doth almighty pervert justice thy child sinned cast away transgression thou wouldest seek unto god betimes make thy supplication almighty thou wert pure upright surely would awake thee make habitation thy righteousness prosperous though thy beginning wa small yet thy latter end greatly increase enquire pray thee former age prepare thyself search father yesterday know nothing day upon earth shadow shall teach thee tell thee utter word heart rush grow without mire flag grow without water whilst yet greenness cut withereth herb path forget god hypocrite hope shall perish whose hope shall cut whose trust shall spider web shall lean upon house shall stand shall hold fast shall endure green sun branch shooteth forth garden root wrapped heap seeth place stone destroy place shall deny saying seen thee behold joy way earth shall others grow behold god cast away perfect man neither help evil doer till fill thy mouth laughing thy lip rejoicing hate thee shall clothed shame dwelling place wicked shall come nought job answered said know truth man god contend cannot answer one thousand wise heart mighty strength hath hardened hath prospered removeth mountain know overturneth anger shaketh earth place pillar thereof tremble commandeth sun riseth sealeth star alone spreadeth heaven treadeth upon wave sea maketh arcturus orion pleiades chamber south doeth great thing past finding yea wonder without number lo goeth see passeth also perceive behold taketh away believe hearkened unto voice breaketh tempest multiplieth wound without cause suffer take breath filleth bitterness speak strength lo strong judgment shall set time plead justify mine mouth shall condemn say perfect shall also prove perverse though perfect yet would know soul would despise life one thing therefore said destroyeth perfect wicked scourge slay suddenly laugh trial innocent earth knowest wicked none deliver thine hand thine hand made fashioned together round yet thou dost destroy remember beseech thee thou hast made clay wilt thou bring dust hast thou poured milk curdled like cheese thou hast clothed skin flesh hast fenced bone sinew thou hast granted life favour thy visitation hath preserved spirit thing hast thou hid thine heart know thee sin thou markest thou wilt acquit mine iniquity wicked woe unto righteous yet lift head full confusion therefore see thou mine affliction increaseth thou huntest fierce lion thou shewest thyself marvellous upon thou renewest thou foolish shouldest thou die thy time good thou shouldest take hold yea also withdraw thine hand feareth god shall come forth wisdom strengtheneth wise ten mighty men city man upon earth doeth good time wherein one man ruleth another hurt saw wicked buried come gone place holy forgotten city done also vanity sentence evil work executed speedily therefore heart son men fully set evil though sinner evil hundred time day prolonged yet surely know shall well fear god fear shall well wicked neither shall prolong day shadow feareth god vanity done upon earth men unto happeneth according work wicked wicked men happeneth according work righteous said also vanity commended mirth man hath better thing sun eat drink merry shall abide labour day life god giveth sun applied mine heart know wisdom see business done upon earth also neither day night seeth sleep eye beheld work god man cannot find work done sun though man labour seek yet shall find yea farther though wise man think know yet shall able find considered heart even declare righteous wise work hand god man knoweth either love hatred thing come alike one event righteous wicked good clean unclean sacrificeth sacrificeth spirit upon thee word put thy mouth shall depart thy mouth mouth thy seed mouth thy seed seed saith lord henceforth ever arise shine thy light come glory lord risen upon thee behold darkness shall cover earth gross darkness people lord shall arise upon thee glory shall seen upon thee gentile shall come thy light king brightness thy rising lift thine eye round see gather together come thee thy son shall come far thy daughter shall nursed thy side thou shalt see flow together thine heart shall fear enlarged abundance sea shall converted unto thee force gentile shall come unto thee multitude camel shall cover thee dromedary midian ephah sheba shall come shall bring gold incense shall shew forth praise lord flock kedar shall gathered together unto thee ram nebaioth shall minister unto thee force gentile king may brought nation kingdom serve thee shall perish yea nation shall utterly wasted glory lebanon shall come unto thee fir tree pine tree box together beautify place sanctuary make thee make thee eternal excellency joy many generation thou shalt also suck milk gentile shalt suck breast king thou shalt know lord thy saviour thy redeemer mighty one jacob brass bring gold iron bring silver wood brass stone iron also make thy officer peace thine exactors righteousness violence shall heard thy land wasting destruction within thy border thou shalt call thy wall salvation thy gate praise sun shall thy light day neither brightness shall moon give light unto thee lord shall unto thee everlasting light thy god thy glory thy sun shall go neither shall thy moon withdraw lord shall thine everlasting light day thy mourning shall ended thy people also shall righteous shall inherit land ever branch planting work hand may glorified little one shall become thousand small one
