judah saith lord cause return land gave father shall posse word lord spake concerning israel concerning judah thus saith lord heard voice trembling fear peace ask ye see whether man doth travail child wherefore see every man hand loin woman travail face turned paleness ala day great none like even time jacob trouble shall saved shall come pas day saith lord host break yoke thy neck burst thy bond stranger shall serve shall serve lord god david king raise unto therefore fear thou servant jacob saith lord neither dismayed israel lo save thee afar thy seed land captivity jacob shall return shall rest quiet none shall make afraid thee saith lord save thee though make full end nation whither scattered thee yet make full end thee correct thee measure leave thee altogether unpunished thus saith lord thy bruise incurable thy wound grievous none plead thy cause thou mayest bound thou hast healing medicine thy lover forgotten thee seek thee wounded thee wound enemy chastisement cruel one multitude thine iniquity thy sin increased criest thou thine affliction thy sorrow incurable multitude thine iniquity thy sin increased done thing unto thee therefore devour thee shall devoured thine adversary every one shall go captivity spoil thee shall spoil prey upon thee give prey restore health unto thee heal thee thy wound saith lord called thee outcast saying zion man seeketh thus saith lord behold bring captivity jacob tent mercy dwellingplaces city shall builded upon heap palace shall remain manner thereof shall proceed thanksgiving voice make merry multiply shall also glorify shall small child also shall aforetime congregation shall established punish oppress noble shall governor shall proceed midst cause draw near shall approach unto engaged heart approach unto saith lord ye shall people god behold whirlwind lord goeth forth fury continuing whirlwind shall fall pain upon head wicked fierce anger lord shall return hath done performed intent heart latter day ye shall consider time saith lord god family israel shall people thus saith lord people left sword found grace wilderness even israel went cause rest lord hath appeared old unto saying yea loved thee everlasting love therefore lovingkindness drawn thee build thee thou shalt built virgin israel thou shalt adorned thy tabrets shalt go forth dance make merry thou shalt yet plant vine upon mountain samaria planter shall plant shall eat common thing shall day watchman upon mount ephraim shall cry arise ye let u go zion unto lord god thus saith lord sing gladness jacob shout among chief nation publish ye praise ye say lord save thy people remnant israel behold bring north country gather coast earth blind lame woman child travaileth child together great company shall return thither shall come weeping supplication lead cause walk river water straight way wherein shall stumble father israel ephraim firstborn hear word lord ye nation declare isle afar say scattered israel gather keep shepherd doth flock lord hath redeemed jacob ransomed hand wa stronger therefore shall come sing height zion shall flow together goodness lord wheat wine oil young flock herd soul shall watered garden shall sorrow shall virgin rejoice dance young men old together turn mourning joy comfort make rejoice sorrow satiate soul priest fatness people shall satisfied goodness saith lord thus saith lord voice wa heard ramah lamentation bitter weeping rahel weeping child refused comforted child thus saith lord refrain thy voice weeping thine eye tear thy work shall rewarded saith lord shall come land enemy hope thine end saith lord thy child shall come border surely heard ephraim bemoaning thus thou hast chastised wa chastised bullock unaccustomed yoke turn thou shall turned thou art lord god surely wa turned repented wa instructed smote upon thigh wa ashamed yea even confounded bear reproach youth ephraim dear son pleasant child since spake earnestly remember still therefore bowel troubled surely mercy upon saith lord set thee waymarks make thee high heap set thine heart toward highway even way thou wentest turn virgin israel turn thy city long wilt thou go thou backsliding daughter lord hath created new thing earth woman shall compass man thus saith lord host god israel yet shall use speech land judah city thereof shall bring captivity lord bless thee habitation justice mountain holiness shall dwell judah city thereof together husbandman go forth flock satiated weary soul replenished every sorrowful soul upon awaked beheld sleep wa sweet unto behold day come saith lord sow house israel house judah seed man seed beast shall come pas like watched pluck break throw destroy afflict watch build plant saith lord day shall say father eaten sour grape child teeth set edge every one shall die iniquity every man eateth sour grape teeth shall set edge behold day come saith lord make new covenant house israel house judah according covenant made father day took hand bring land egypt covenant brake although wa husband unto saith lord shall covenant make house israel day saith lord put law inward part write heart god shall people shall teach every man neighbour every man brother saying know lord shall know least unto greatest saith lord forgive iniquity remember sin thus saith lord giveth sun light day ordinance moon star light night divideth sea wave thereof roar lord host name ordinance depart saith lord seed israel also shall cease nation ever thus saith lord heaven measured foundation earth searched beneath also cast seed israel done saith lord behold day come saith lord city shall built lord tower hananeel unto gate corner measuring line shall yet go forth upon hill gareb shall compass goath whole valley dead body ash field unto brook kidron unto corner horse gate toward east shall holy unto lord shall plucked thrown ever word came jeremiah lord tenth year zedekiah king judah wa eighteenth year nebuchadrezzar king babylon army besieged jerusalem jeremiah prophet wa shut court prison wa king judah house zedekiah king judah shut saying wherefore dost thou prophesy say thus saith lord behold give city hand king babylon shall take zedekiah king judah shall escape hand chaldean shall surely delivered hand king babylon shall speak mouth mouth eye shall behold eye shall lead zedekiah babylon shall visit saith lord though ye fight chaldean ye shall prosper jeremiah said word lord came unto saying behold hanameel son shallum thine uncle shall come unto thee saying buy thee field anathoth right redemption thine buy hanameel mine uncle son came court prison according word lord said unto buy field pray thee anathoth country benjamin right inheritance thine redemption thine buy thyself knew wa word lord bought field hanameel uncle son wa anathoth weighed money even seventeen shekel silver subscribed evidence sealed took witness weighed money balance took evidence purchase wa sealed according law custom wa open purchase unto baruch son neriah prayed unto lord saying ah lord god behold thou hast made heaven earth thy great power stretched arm nothing hard thee thou shewest lovingkindness unto thousand recompensest iniquity father bosom child great mighty god lord host name great counsel mighty work thine eye open upon way son men give every one according way according fruit doings hast set sign wonder land egypt even unto day israel among men hast made thee name day hast brought forth thy people israel land egypt sign wonder strong hand stretched arm great terror hast given land thou didst swear father give land flowing milk honey came possessed obeyed thy voice neither walked thy law done nothing thou commandedst therefore thou hast caused evil come upon behold mount come unto city jehoiakim son josiah king judah saying thus saith lord god israel unto thee baruch thou didst say woe lord hath added grief sorrow fainted sighing find rest thus shalt thou say unto lord saith thus behold built break planted pluck even whole land seekest thou great thing thyself seek behold bring evil upon flesh saith lord thy life give unto thee prey place whither thou goest word lord came jeremiah prophet gentile egypt army pharaohnecho king egypt wa river euphrates carchemish nebuchadrezzar king babylon smote fourth year jehoiakim son josiah king judah order ye buckler shield draw near battle harness horse get ye horseman stand forth helmet furbish spear put brigandine wherefore seen dismayed turned away back mighty one beaten fled apace look back fear wa round saith lord let swift flee away mighty man escape shall stumble fall toward north river euphrates cometh flood whose water moved river egypt riseth like flood water moved like river saith go cover earth destroy city unto son man stand upon thy foot speak unto thee spirit entered spake unto set upon foot heard spake unto said unto son man send thee child israel rebellious nation hath rebelled father transgressed even unto day impudent child stiffhearted send thee unto thou shalt say unto thus saith lord god whether hear whether forbear rebellious house yet shall know hath prophet among thou son man afraid neither afraid word though brier thorn thee thou dost dwell among scorpion afraid word dismayed look though rebellious house thou shalt speak word unto whether hear whether forbear rebellious thou son man hear say unto thee thou rebellious like rebellious house open thy mouth eat give thee looked behold hand wa sent unto lo roll book wa therein spread wa written within without wa written therein lamentation mourning woe moreover said unto son man eat thou findest eat roll go speak unto house israel opened mouth caused eat roll said unto son man cause thy belly eat fill thy bowel roll give thee eat wa mouth honey sweetness said unto son man go get thee unto house israel speak word unto thou art sent people strange speech hard language house israel many people strange speech hard language whose word thou canst understand surely sent thee would hearkened unto thee house israel hearken unto thee hearken unto house israel impudent hardhearted behold made thy face strong face thy forehead strong forehead adamant harder flint made thy forehead fear neither dismayed look though rebellious house moreover said unto son man word shall speak unto thee receive thine heart hear thine ear go get thee captivity unto child thy people speak unto tell thus saith lord god whether hear whether forbear spirit took heard behind voice great rushing saying blessed glory lord place heard also shalt surely die thou givest warning speakest warn wicked wicked way save life wicked man shall die iniquity blood require thine hand yet thou warn wicked turn wickedness wicked way shall die iniquity thou hast delivered thy soul righteous man doth turn righteousness commit iniquity lay stumbling block shall die thou hast given warning shall die sin righteousness hath done shall remembered blood require thine hand nevertheless thou warn righteous man righteous sin doth sin shall surely live warned also thou hast delivered thy soul hand lord wa upon said unto arise go forth plain talk thee arose went forth plain behold glory lord stood glory saw river chebar fell face spirit entered set upon foot spake said unto go shut thyself within thine house thou son man behold shall put band upon thee shall bind thee thou shalt go among make thy tongue cleave roof thy mouth thou shalt dumb shalt reprover rebellious house speak thee open thy mouth thou shalt say unto thus saith lord god heareth let hear forbeareth let forbear rebellious house thou also son man take thee tile lay thee pourtray upon city even jerusalem lay siege build fort cast mount set camp also set battering ram round prophesy behold lay band upon thee thou shalt turn thee one side another till thou hast ended day thy siege take thou also unto thee wheat barley bean lentiles millet fitch put one vessel make thee consumed midst thee third part shall fall sword round thee scatter third part wind draw sword thus shall mine anger accomplished cause fury rest upon comforted shall know lord spoken zeal accomplished lord god unto jerusalem thy birth thy nativity land canaan thy father wa amorite thy mother hittite thy nativity day thou wast born thy navel wa cut neither wast thou washed water supple thee thou wast salted swaddled none eye pitied thee unto thee compassion upon thee thou wast cast open field lothing thy person day thou wast born passed thee saw thee polluted thine blood said unto thee thou wast thy blood live yea said unto thee thou wast thy blood live caused thee multiply bud field thou hast increased waxen great thou art come excellent ornament thy breast fashioned thine hair grown whereas thou wast naked bare passed thee looked upon thee behold thy time wa time love spread skirt thee covered thy nakedness yea sware unto thee entered covenant thee saith lord god thou becamest mine washed thee water yea throughly washed away thy blood thee anointed thee oil clothed thee also broidered work shod thee badger skin girded thee fine linen covered thee silk decked thee also ornament put bracelet upon thy hand chain thy neck put jewel thy forehead earring thine ear beautiful crown upon thine head thus wast thou decked gold silver thy raiment wa fine linen silk broidered work thou didst eat fine flour honey oil thou wast exceeding beautiful thou didst prosper kingdom thy renown went forth among heathen thy beauty wa perfect comeliness put upon thee saith lord god thou didst trust thine beauty playedst harlot thy renown pouredst thy fornication every one passed wa thy garment thou didst take deckedst thy high place diver colour playedst harlot thereupon like thing shall come neither shall thou hast also taken thy fair jewel gold silver given thee madest thyself image men didst commit whoredom tookest thy broidered garment coveredst thou hast set mine oil mine incense meat also gave thee fine flour oil honey wherewith fed thee thou hast even set sweet savour thus wa saith lord god moreover thou hast taken thy son thy daughter thou hast borne unto hast thou sacrificed unto devoured thy whoredom small matter thou hast slain child delivered cause pas fire thine abomination thy whoredom thou hast remembered day thy youth thou wast naked bare wast polluted thy blood came pas thy wickedness woe woe unto thee saith lord god thou hast also built unto thee eminent place hast made thee high place every street thou hast built thy high place every head way hast made thy beauty abhorred hast opened thy foot every one passed multiplied thy whoredom thou hast also committed fornication egyptian thy neighbour great flesh hast increased thy whoredom provoke anger behold therefore stretched hand thee diminished thine ordinary food delivered thee unto hate thee daughter philistine ashamed thy lewd way thou hast played whore also assyrian thou wast unsatiable yea thou hast played harlot yet couldest satisfied thou hast moreover multiplied thy fornication land canaan unto chaldea yet thou wast satisfied therewith weak thine heart saith lord god seeing thou doest thing work imperious whorish woman thou buildest thine eminent place head every way makest thine high place every street hast harlot thou scornest hire wife committeth adultery taketh stranger instead husband give gift whore thou givest thy gift thy lover hirest may come unto thee every side thy whoredom contrary thee woman thy whoredom whereas none followeth thee commit whoredom thou givest reward reward given unto thee therefore thou art contrary wherefore harlot hear word lord thus saith lord god thy filthiness wa poured thy nakedness discovered thy whoredom thy lover idol thy abomination blood thy child thou didst give unto behold therefore gather thy lover thou hast taken pleasure thou hast loved thou hast hated even gather round thee discover thy nakedness unto may see thy nakedness judge thee woman break wedlock shed blood judged give thee blood fury jealousy also give thee hand shall throw thine eminent place shall break thy high place shall strip thee also thy clothes shall take thy fair jewel leave thee naked bare shall also bring company thee shall stone thee stone thrust thee sword shall burn thine house fire execute judgment upon thee sight many woman cause thee cease playing harlot thou also shalt give hire make fury toward thee rest jealousy shall depart thee quiet angry thou hast remembered day thy youth hast fretted thing behold therefore also recompense thy way upon thine head saith lord god thou shalt commit lewdness thine abomination behold every one useth proverb shall use proverb thee saying mother daughter thou art thy mother daughter lotheth husband child thou art sister thy sister lothed husband child mother wa hittite father amorite thine elder sister samaria daughter dwell thy left hand thy younger thou hast committed abominable righteous thou yea thou confounded also bear thy shame thou hast justified thy sister shall bring captivity captivity sodom daughter captivity samaria daughter bring bring forth branch might bear fruit might goodly vine say thou thus saith lord god shall prosper shall pull root thereof cut fruit thereof wither shall wither leaf spring even without great power many people pluck root thereof yea behold planted shall prosper shall utterly wither east wind toucheth shall wither furrow grew moreover word lord came unto saying say rebellious house know ye thing mean tell behold king babylon come jerusalem hath taken king thereof prince thereof led babylon hath taken king seed made covenant hath taken oath hath also taken mighty land kingdom might base might lift concerning land israel saying father eaten sour grape child teeth set edge live saith lord god ye shall occasion use proverb israel behold soul mine soul father also soul son mine soul sinneth shall die man lawful right hath eaten upon mountain neither hath lifted eye idol house israel neither hath defiled neighbour wife neither hath come near menstruous woman hath oppressed hath restored debtor pledge hath spoiled none violence hath given bread hungry hath covered naked garment hath given forth upon usury neither hath taken increase hath withdrawn hand iniquity hath executed true judgment man man hath walked statute hath kept judgment deal truly shall surely live saith lord god beget son robber shedder blood doeth like one thing doeth duty even hath eaten upon mountain defiled neighbour wife hath oppressed poor needy hath spoiled violence hath restored pledge hath lifted eye idol hath committed abomination hath given forth upon usury hath taken increase shall live shall live hath done abomination shall surely die blood shall upon lo beget son seeth father sin hath done considereth doeth like hath eaten upon mountain neither hath lifted eye idol house israel hath defiled neighbour wife neither hath oppressed hath withholden pledge neither hath spoiled violence hath given bread hungry hath covered naked garment hath taken hand poor hath received usury increase hath executed judgment hath walked statute shall die iniquity father shall surely live father cruelly oppressed spoiled brother violence good among people lo even shall die iniquity yet say ye doth son bear iniquity father son hath done lawful right hath kept statute hath done shall surely live soul sinneth shall die son shall bear iniquity father neither shall father bear iniquity son righteousness righteous shall upon wickedness wicked shall upon wicked turn sin hath committed keep statute lawful right shall surely live shall die transgression hath committed shall mentioned unto righteousness hath done shall live pleasure wicked die saith lord god return way live righteous turneth away righteousness committeth iniquity doeth according abomination wicked man doeth shall live righteousness hath done shall mentioned trespass hath trespassed sin hath sinned shall die yet ye say way lord equal hear house israel way equal way unequal righteous man turneth away righteousness committeth iniquity dieth iniquity hath done shall die wicked man turneth away wickedness hath committed doeth lawful right shall save soul alive considereth turneth away transgression hath committed shall surely live shall die yet saith house israel way lord equal house israel way equal way unequal therefore judge house israel every one according way saith lord god repent turn transgression pas seventh year fifth month tenth day month certain elder israel came enquire lord sat came word lord unto saying son man speak unto elder israel say unto thus saith lord god ye come enquire live saith lord god enquired wilt thou judge son man wilt thou judge cause know abomination father say unto thus saith lord god day chose israel lifted mine hand unto seed house jacob made known unto land egypt lifted mine hand unto saying lord god day lifted mine hand unto bring forth land egypt land espied flowing milk honey glory land said unto cast ye away every man abomination eye defile idol egypt lord god rebelled would hearken unto every man cast away abomination eye neither forsake idol egypt said pour fury upon accomplish anger midst land egypt wrought name sake polluted heathen among whose sight made known unto bringing forth land egypt wherefore caused go forth land egypt brought wilderness gave statute shewed judgment man shall even live moreover also gave sabbath sign might know lord sanctify house israel rebelled wilderness walked statute despised judgment man shall even live sabbath greatly polluted said would pour fury upon wilderness consume wrought name sake polluted heathen whose sight brought yet also lifted hand unto wilderness would bring land given flowing milk honey glory land despised judgment walked statute polluted sabbath heart went idol nevertheless mine eye spared destroying neither make end wilderness said unto child wilderness walk ye statute father neither observe judgment defile idol lord god walk statute keep judgment hallow sabbath shall sign ye may know lord god notwithstanding child rebelled walked statute neither kept judgment man shall even live polluted sabbath said would pour fury upon accomplish anger wilderness nevertheless withdrew mine hand wrought name sake polluted sight heathen whose sight brought forth lifted mine hand unto also wilderness would scatter among heathen disperse country executed judgment despised statute polluted sabbath eye father idol wherefore gave also statute good judgment whereby live polluted gift caused pas fire openeth womb might make desolate end might know lord therefore son man speak unto house israel say unto thus saith lord god yet father blasphemed committed trespass brought land lifted mine hand give saw every high hill thick tree offered sacrifice presented provocation offering also made sweet savour poured drink offering said unto high place whereunto ye go name whereof called bamah unto day wherefore say unto house israel thus saith lord god ye heathen family country serve wood stone live saith lord god surely mighty hand stretched arm fury poured rule bring people gather country wherein ye scattered mighty hand stretched arm fury poured bring wilderness people plead face face like pleaded father wilderness land egypt plead saith lord god cause pas rod bring bond covenant purge among rebel transgress bring forth country sojourn shall enter land israel ye shall know lord house israel thus saith lord god go ye serve ye every one idol hereafter also ye hearken unto pollute ye holy name gift idol mine holy mountain mountain height shall know lord shall bring land israel country lifted mine hand give father shall ye remember way doings wherein ye defiled ye shall lothe sight evil ye committed ye shall know lord wrought name sake according wicked way according corrupt doings ye house israel saith lord god moreover word lord came unto saying son man set thy face toward south drop thy word toward south prophesy forest south field say forest south hear word lord thus saith lord god behold kindle fire thee shall devour every green tree thee every dry tree flaming flame shall quenched face south north shall burned therein flesh shall see lord kindled shall quenched said ah lord god say doth speak parable word lord came unto saying son man set thy face toward jerusalem drop thy word toward holy place prophesy land israel say land israel thus saith lord behold thee draw forth sword sheath cut thee righteous wicked seeing cut thee righteous wicked therefore shall sword go forth sheath flesh south north flesh may know lord drawn forth sword sheath shall return sigh therefore thou son man breaking thy loin bitterness sigh eye shall say unto thee wherefore sighest thou thou shalt answer tidings cometh every heart shall melt hand shall feeble every spirit shall faint knee shall weak water behold cometh shall brought pas saith lord god word lord came unto saying son man prophesy say thus saith lord say sword sword sharpened also furbished sharpened make sore slaughter furbished may glitter make mirth contemneth rod son every tree hath given furbished may handled sword sharpened furbished give hand slayer cry howl son man shall upon people shall upon prince israel terror reason sword shall upon people smite therefore upon thy thigh trial sword contemn even rod shall saith lord god thou therefore son man prophesy smite thine hand together let sword doubled third time sword slain sword great men slain entereth privy chamber set point sword gate heart may faint ruin multiplied ah made bright wrapped slaughter go thee one way either right hand left whithersoever thy face set also smite mine hand together cause fury rest lord said word lord came unto saying also thou son man appoint thee pour mine indignation upon thee blow thee fire wrath deliver thee hand brutish men skilful destroy thou shalt fuel fire thy blood shall midst land thou shalt remembered lord spoken moreover word lord came unto saying thou son man wilt thou judge wilt thou judge bloody city yea thou shalt shew abomination say thou thus saith lord god city sheddeth blood midst time may come maketh idol defile thou art become guilty thy blood thou hast shed hast defiled thyself thine idol thou hast made thou hast caused thy day draw near art come even unto thy year therefore made thee reproach unto heathen mocking country near far thee shall mock thee art infamous much vexed behold prince israel every one thee power shed blood thee set light father mother midst thee dealt oppression stranger thee vexed fatherless widow thou hast despised mine holy thing hast profaned sabbath thee men carry tale shed blood thee eat upon mountain midst thee commit lewdness thee discovered father nakedness thee humbled wa set apart pollution one hath committed abomination neighbour wife another hath lewdly defiled daughter law another thee hath humbled sister father daughter thee taken gift shed blood thou hast taken usury increase thou hast greedily gained thy neighbour extortion hast forgotten saith lord god behold therefore smitten mine hand thy dishonest gain thou hast made thy blood hath midst thee thine heart endure thine hand strong day shall deal thee lord spoken scatter thee among heathen disperse thee country consume thy filthiness thee thou shalt take thine inheritance thyself sight didst wash thyself paintedst thy eye deckedst thyself ornament satest upon stately bed table prepared whereupon thou hast set mine incense mine oil voice multitude ease wa men common sort brought company much people shall slay sword thy daughter field shall make fort thee cast mount thee lift buckler thee shall set engine war thy wall ax shall break thy tower reason abundance horse dust shall cover thee thy wall shall shake noise horseman wheel chariot shall enter thy gate men enter city wherein made breach hoof horse shall tread thy street shall slay thy people sword thy strong garrison shall go ground shall make spoil thy rich make prey thy merchandise shall break thy wall destroy thy pleasant house shall lay thy stone thy timber thy dust midst water cause noise thy song cease sound bough heart lifted height therefore delivered hand mighty one heathen shall surely deal driven wickedness stranger terrible nation cut left upon mountain valley branch fallen bough broken river land people earth gone shadow left upon ruin shall fowl heaven remain beast field shall upon branch end none tree water exalt height neither shoot top among thick bough neither tree stand height drink pas twelfth year twelfth month first day month word lord came unto saying son man take lamentation pharaoh king egypt say unto thou art like young lion nation thou art whale sea thou camest forth thy river troubledst water thy foot fouledst river thus saith lord god therefore spread net thee company many people shall bring thee net leave thee upon land cast thee forth upon open field cause fowl heaven remain upon thee fill beast whole earth thee lay thy flesh upon mountain fill valley thy height also water thy blood land wherein thou swimmest even mountain river shall full thee shall put thee cover heaven make star thereof dark cover sun cloud moon shall give light bright light heaven make dark thee set darkness upon thy land saith lord god also vex heart many people shall bring thy destruction among nation country thou hast known yea make many people amazed thee king shall horribly afraid thee shall brandish sword shall tremble every moment every man life day thy fall thus saith lord god sword king babylon shall come upon thee sword mighty cause thy multitude fall terrible nation shall spoil pomp egypt multitude thereof shall destroyed destroy also beast thereof beside great water neither shall foot man trouble hoof beast trouble make water deep cause river run like oil saith lord god shall make land egypt desolate country shall destitute whereof wa full shall smite dwell speak child thy people say unto bring sword upon land people land take man coast set watchman seeth sword come upon land blow trumpet warn people whosoever heareth sound trumpet taketh warning sword come take away blood shall upon head heard sound trumpet took warning blood shall upon taketh warning shall deliver soul watchman see sword come blow trumpet people warned sword come take person among taken away iniquity blood require watchman hand thou son man set thee watchman unto house israel therefore thou shalt hear word mouth warn say unto wicked wicked man thou shalt surely die thou dost speak warn wicked way wicked man shall die iniquity blood require thine hand nevertheless thou warn wicked way turn turn way shall die iniquity thou hast delivered thy soul therefore thou son man speak unto house israel thus ye speak saying transgression sin upon u pine away live say unto live saith lord god pleasure death wicked wicked turn way live turn ye turn ye evil way ye die house israel therefore thou son man say unto child thy people righteousness righteous shall deliver day transgression wickedness wicked shall fall thereby day turneth wickedness neither shall righteous able live righteousness day sinneth shall say righteous shall surely live trust righteousness commit iniquity righteousness shall remembered iniquity hath committed shall die say unto wicked thou shalt surely die turn sin lawful right wicked restore pledge give robbed walk statute life without committing iniquity shall surely live shall die none sin hath committed shall mentioned unto hath done lawful right shall surely live yet child thy people say way lord equal way equal righteous turneth righteousness committeth iniquity shall even die thereby wicked turn wickedness lawful right shall live thereby yet ye say way lord equal ye house israel judge every one way came pas twelfth year captivity tenth month fifth day month one escaped jerusalem came unto saying city smitten hand lord wa upon evening afore wa escaped came opened mouth came morning mouth wa opened wa dumb word lord came unto saying son man inhabit waste land israel speak saying abraham wa one inherited land many land given u inheritance wherefore say unto thus saith lord god ye eat blood lift eye toward idol shed blood shall ye posse land ye stand upon sword ye work abomination ye defile every one neighbour wife shall ye posse land say thou thus unto thus saith lord god live surely waste shall fall sword open field give beast devoured fort cave shall die pestilence lay land desolate pomp strength shall cease mountain israel shall desolate none shall pas shall know lord laid land desolate abomination committed also thou son man child thy people still talking thee wall door house speak one another every one brother saying come pray hear word cometh forth lord come unto thee people cometh sit thee people hear thy word mouth shew much love heart goeth covetousness lo thou art unto lovely song one hath pleasant voice play well instrument hear thy word cometh pas lo come shall know prophet hath among word lord came unto saying son man prophesy shepherd israel prophesy say unto thus saith lord god unto shepherd woe shepherd israel feed shepherd feed flock ye eat fat ye clothe wool ye kill fed ye feed flock diseased ye strengthened neither ye healed wa sick neither ye bound wa broken neither ye brought wa driven away neither ye sought wa lost force cruelty ye ruled scattered shepherd became meat beast field scattered sheep wandered mountain upon every high hill yea flock wa scattered upon face earth none search seek therefore ye shepherd hear word lord live saith lord god surely flock became prey flock became meat every beast field wa shepherd neither shepherd search flock shepherd fed fed flock therefore ye shepherd hear word lord thus saith lord god behold shepherd require flock hand cause cease feeding flock neither shall shepherd feed deliver flock mouth may meat thus saith lord god behold even search sheep seek shepherd seeketh flock day among sheep scattered seek sheep deliver place scattered cloudy dark day bring people gather country bring land feed upon mountain israel river inhabited place country feed good pasture upon high mountain israel shall fold shall lie good fold fat pasture shall feed upon mountain israel feed flock cause lie saith lord god seek wa lost bring wa driven away bind wa broken strengthen wa sick destroy fat strong feed judgment flock thus saith lord god behold judge cattle cattle ram goat seemeth small thing unto eaten good pasture ye must tread foot residue pasture drunk deep water ye must foul residue foot flock eat ye trodden foot drink ye fouled foot therefore thus saith lord god unto behold even judge fat cattle lean cattle ye thrust side shoulder pushed diseased horn till ye scattered abroad therefore save flock shall prey judge cattle cattle set one shepherd shall feed even servant david shall feed shall shepherd lord god servant david prince among lord spoken make covenant peace cause evil beast cease land shall dwell safely wilderness sleep wood make place round hill blessing cause shower come season shall shower blessing tree field shall yield fruit earth shall yield increase shall safe land shall know lord broken band yoke delivered hand served shall prey heathen neither shall beast land devour shall dwell safely none shall make afraid raise plant renown shall consumed hunger land neither bear shame heathen thus shall know lord god even house israel people saith lord god ye flock flock pasture men god saith lord god moreover word lord came unto saying son man set thy face mount seir prophesy say unto thus saith lord god behold mount seir thee stretch mine hand thee make thee desolate lay thy city waste thou shalt desolate thou shalt know lord thou hast perpetual hatred hast shed blood child israel force sword time calamity time iniquity end therefore live saith lord god prepare thee unto blood blood shall pursue thee sith thou hast hated blood even blood shall pursue thee thus make mount seir desolate cut passeth returneth fill mountain slain men thy hill thy valley thy river shall fall slain sword make thee perpetual desolation thy city shall return ye shall know lord thou hast said two nation two country shall mine posse whereas lord wa therefore live saith lord god even according thine anger according thine envy thou hast used thy hatred make known among judged thee thou shalt know lord heard thy blasphemy thou hast spoken mountain israel saying laid desolate given u consume thus mouth ye boasted multiplied word heard thus saith lord god whole earth rejoiceth make thee desolate thou didst rejoice inheritance house israel wa desolate unto thee thou shalt desolate mount seir idumea even shall know lord also thou son man prophesy unto mountain israel say ye mountain israel hear word lord thus saith lord god enemy hath said aha even ancient high place possession therefore prophesy say thus saith lord god made desolate swallowed every side ye might possession unto residue heathen ye taken lip talker infamy people therefore ye mountain israel hear word lord god thus saith lord god mountain hill river valley desolate waste city forsaken became prey derision residue heathen round therefore thus saith lord god surely fire jealousy spoken residue heathen idumea appointed land possession joy heart despiteful mind cast prey prophesy therefore concerning land israel say unto mountain hill river valley thus saith lord god behold spoken jealousy fury ye borne shame heathen therefore thus saith lord god lifted mine hand surely heathen shall bear shame ye mountain israel ye shall shoot forth branch yield fruit people israel hand come behold turn unto ye shall tilled sown multiply men upon house israel even city shall inhabited waste shall builded multiply upon man beast shall increase bring fruit settle old estate better unto beginning ye shall know lord yea cause men walk upon even people israel shall posse thee thou shalt inheritance thou shalt henceforth bereave men thus saith lord god say unto thou land devourest men hast bereaved thy nation therefore thou shalt devour men neither bereave thy nation saith lord god neither cause men hear thee shame heathen neither shalt thou bear reproach people neither shalt thou cause thy nation fall saith lord god moreover word lord came unto saying son man house israel dwelt land defiled way doings way wa uncleanness removed woman wherefore poured fury upon blood shed upon land idol wherewith polluted scattered among heathen dispersed country according way according doings judged entered unto heathen whither went profaned holy name said people lord gone forth land pity mine holy name house israel profaned among heathen whither went therefore say unto house israel thus saith lord god sake house israel mine holy name sake ye profaned among heathen whither ye went sanctify great name wa profaned among heathen ye profaned midst heathen shall know lord saith lord god shall sanctified eye take among heathen gather country bring land sprinkle clean water upon ye shall clean filthiness idol cleanse new heart also give new spirit put within take away stony heart flesh give heart flesh put spirit within cause walk statute ye shall keep judgment ye shall dwell land gave father ye shall people god also save uncleanness call corn increase lay famine upon multiply fruit tree increase field ye shall receive reproach famine among heathen shall ye remember evil way doings good shall lothe sight iniquity abomination sake saith lord god known unto ashamed confounded way house israel thus saith lord god day shall cleansed iniquity also cause dwell city waste shall builded desolate land shall tilled whereas lay desolate sight passed shall say land wa desolate become like garden eden waste desolate ruined city become fenced inhabited heathen left round shall know lord build ruined place plant wa desolate lord spoken thus saith lord god yet enquired house israel increase men like flock holy flock flock jerusalem solemn feast shall waste city filled flock men shall know lord hand lord wa upon carried spirit lord set midst valley wa full bone caused pas round behold many open valley lo dry said unto son man bone live answered lord god thou knowest said unto prophesy upon bone say unto ye dry bone hear word lord thus saith lord god unto bone behold cause breath enter ye shall live lay sinew upon bring flesh upon cover skin put breath ye shall live ye shall know lord prophesied wa commanded prophesied wa noise behold shaking bone came together bone bone beheld lo sinew flesh came upon skin covered wa breath said unto prophesy unto wind prophesy son man say wind heart would defile portion king meat wine drank therefore requested prince eunuch might defile god brought daniel favour tender love prince eunuch prince eunuch said unto daniel fear lord king hath appointed meat drink see face worse liking child sort shall ye make endanger head king said daniel melzar prince eunuch set daniel hananiah mishael azariah prove thy servant beseech thee ten day let give u pulse eat water drink let countenance looked upon thee countenance child eat portion king meat thou seest deal thy servant consented matter proved ten day end ten day countenance appeared fairer fatter flesh child eat portion king meat thus melzar took away portion meat wine drink gave pulse four child god gave knowledge skill learning wisdom daniel understanding vision dream end day king said bring prince eunuch brought nebuchadnezzar king communed among wa found none like daniel hananiah mishael azariah therefore stood king matter wisdom understanding king enquired found ten time better magician astrologer realm daniel continued even unto first year king cyrus second year reign nebuchadnezzar nebuchadnezzar dreamed dream wherewith spirit wa troubled sleep brake king commanded call magician astrologer sorcerer chaldean shew king dream came stood king king said unto dreamed dream spirit wa troubled know dream spake chaldean king syriack king live ever tell thy servant dream shew interpretation king answered said chaldean thing gone ye make known unto dream interpretation thereof ye shall cut piece house shall made dunghill ye shew dream interpretation thereof ye shall receive gift reward great honour therefore shew dream interpretation thereof answered said let king tell servant dream shew interpretation king answered said know certainty ye would gain time ye see thing gone ye make known unto dream one decree ye prepared lying corrupt word speak till time changed therefore tell dream shall know ye shew interpretation thereof chaldean answered king said man upon earth shew king matter therefore king lord ruler asked thing magician astrologer chaldean rare thing king requireth none shew king except god whose dwelling flesh cause king wa angry furious commanded destroy wise men babylon decree went forth wise men slain sought daniel fellow slain daniel answered counsel wisdom arioch captain king guard wa gone forth slay wise men babylon answered said arioch king captain decree hasty king arioch made thing known daniel daniel went desired king would give time would shew king interpretation daniel went house made thing known hananiah mishael azariah companion would desire mercy god heaven concerning secret daniel fellow perish rest wise men babylon wa secret revealed unto daniel night vision daniel blessed god heaven daniel answered said blessed name god ever ever wisdom might changeth time season removeth king setteth king giveth wisdom unto wise knowledge know understanding revealeth deep secret thing knoweth darkness light dwelleth thank thee praise thee thou god father hast given wisdom might hast made known unto desired thee thou hast made known unto u king matter therefore daniel went unto arioch king ordained destroy wise men babylon went said thus unto destroy wise men babylon bring king shew unto king interpretation arioch brought daniel king haste said thus unto found man captive judah make known unto king interpretation king answered said daniel whose name wa belteshazzar art thou able make known unto dream seen interpretation thereof daniel answered presence king said secret king hath master fear saith lord host unto priest despise name ye say wherein despised thy name ye offer polluted bread upon mine altar ye say wherein polluted thee ye say table lord contemptible ye offer blind sacrifice evil ye offer lame sick evil offer unto thy governor pleased thee accept thy person saith lord host pray beseech god gracious unto u hath mean regard person saith lord host even among would shut door nought neither ye kindle fire mine altar nought pleasure saith lord host neither accept offering hand rising sun even unto going name shall great among gentile every place incense shall offered unto name pure offering name shall great among heathen saith lord host ye profaned ye say table lord polluted fruit thereof even meat contemptible ye said also behold weariness ye snuffed saith lord host ye brought wa torn lame sick thus ye brought offering accept hand saith lord cursed deceiver hath flock male voweth sacrificeth unto lord corrupt thing great king saith lord host name dreadful among heathen ye priest commandment ye hear ye lay heart give glory unto name saith lord host even send curse upon curse blessing yea cursed already ye lay heart behold corrupt seed spread dung upon face even dung solemn feast one shall take away ye shall know sent commandment unto covenant might levi saith lord host covenant wa life peace gave fear wherewith feared wa afraid name law truth wa mouth iniquity wa found lip walked peace equity turn many away iniquity priest lip keep knowledge seek law mouth messenger lord host ye departed way ye caused many stumble law ye corrupted covenant levi saith lord host therefore also made contemptible base people according ye kept way partial law one father hath one god created u deal treacherously every man brother profaning covenant father judah hath dealt treacherously abomination committed israel jerusalem judah hath profaned holiness lord loved hath married daughter strange god lord cut man doeth master scholar tabernacle jacob offereth offering unto lord host ye done covering altar lord tear weeping cry insomuch regardeth offering receiveth good hand yet ye say wherefore lord hath witness thee wife thy youth thou hast dealt treacherously yet thy companion wife thy covenant make one yet residue spirit wherefore one might seek godly seed therefore take heed spirit let none deal treacherously wife youth lord god israel saith hateth putting away one covereth violence garment saith lord host therefore take heed spirit ye deal treacherously ye wearied lord word yet ye say wherein wearied ye say every one doeth evil good sight lord delighteth god judgment behold send messenger shall prepare way lord ye seek shall suddenly come temple even messenger covenant ye delight behold shall come saith lord host may abide day coming shall stand appeareth like refiner fire like fuller soap shall sit refiner purifier silver shall purify son levi purge gold silver may offer unto lord offering righteousness shall root tree therefore every tree bringeth forth good fruit hewn cast fire indeed baptize water unto repentance cometh mightier whose shoe worthy bear shall baptize holy ghost fire whose fan hand throughly purge floor gather wheat garner burn chaff unquenchable fire cometh jesus galilee jordan unto john baptized john forbad saying need baptized thee comest thou jesus answering said unto suffer thus becometh u fulfil righteousness suffered jesus wa baptized went straightway water lo heaven opened unto saw spirit god descending like dove lighting upon lo voice heaven saying beloved son well pleased wa jesus led spirit wilderness tempted devil fasted forty day forty night wa afterward hungred tempter came said thou son god command stone made bread answered said written man shall live bread alone every word proceedeth mouth god devil taketh holy city setteth pinnacle temple saith unto thou son god cast thyself written shall give angel charge concerning thee hand shall bear thee lest time thou dash thy foot stone jesus said unto written thou shalt tempt lord thy god devil taketh exceeding high mountain sheweth kingdom world glory saith unto thing give thee thou wilt fall adversary quickly thou art way lest time adversary deliver thee judge judge deliver thee officer thou cast prison verily say unto thee thou shalt mean come thence till thou hast paid uttermost thy member perish thy whole body cast hell thy right hand offend thee cut cast thee profitable thee one thy member perish thy whole body cast hell hath said whosoever shall put away wife let give writing divorcement say unto whosoever shall put away wife saving cause fornication causeth commit adultery whosoever shall marry divorced committeth adultery ye heard hath said old time thou shalt forswear thyself shalt perform unto lord thine oath say unto swear neither heaven god throne earth footstool neither jerusalem city great king neither shalt thou swear thy head thou canst make one thee law take away thy coat let thy cloak also whosoever shall compel thee go mile go twain give asketh thee would borrow thee turn thou away ye heard hath said thou shalt love thy neighbour hate salute brother ye others even publican ye therefore perfect even father heaven perfect take heed ye alms men seen otherwise ye reward father heaven therefore thou doest thine alms sound trumpet thee hypocrite synagogue street may glory men verily say unto reward thou doest alms let thy left hand know thy right hand doeth thine alms may secret thy father seeth secret shall reward thee openly thou prayest thou shalt hypocrite love pray standing synagogue corner street may seen men verily say unto reward thou thou prayest enter thy closet thou hast shut thy door pray thy father secret thy father seeth secret shall reward thee openly ye pray use vain repetition heathen think shall heard much speaking ye therefore like unto father knoweth thing ye need ye ask manner therefore pray ye father art heaven hallowed thy name thy kingdom come thy done earth heaven give u day daily bread forgive u debt forgive debtor lead u temptation deliver u evil thine kingdom power glory ever amen ye forgive men trespass heavenly father also forgive ye forgive men trespass neither father forgive trespass moreover ye fast hypocrite sad countenance disfigure face may appear unto men fast verily say unto reward thou thou fastest anoint thine head wash thy face thou appear unto men fast unto thy father secret thy father seeth secret shall reward thee openly lay treasure upon earth moth rust doth corrupt thief break steal lay treasure heaven neither moth rust doth corrupt thief break steal treasure heart also light body eye therefore thine eye single thy whole body shall full light thine eye evil thy whole body shall full darkness therefore light thee darkness great darkness man serve two master either hate one love else hold one despise ye cannot serve god mammon therefore say unto take thought life ye shall eat ye shall drink yet body ye shall put life meat body raiment behold fowl air sow neither reap gather barn yet heavenly father feedeth ye much better taking thought add one cubit unto stature even sabbath day wa departed thence went synagogue behold wa man hand withered asked saying lawful heal sabbath day might accuse said unto man shall among shall one sheep fall pit sabbath day lay hold lift much man better sheep wherefore lawful well sabbath day saith man stretch forth thine hand stretched forth wa restored whole like pharisee went held council might destroy jesus knew withdrew shall forgiven unto men whosoever speaketh word son man shall forgiven whosoever speaketh holy ghost shall forgiven neither world neither world come either make tree good fruit good else make tree corrupt fruit corrupt tree known fruit generation viper ye evil speak good thing abundance heart mouth speaketh good man good treasure heart bringeth forth good thing evil man evil treasure bringeth forth evil thing say unto every idle word men shall speak shall give account thereof day judgment thy word thou shalt justified thy word thou shalt condemned certain scribe pharisee answered saying master would see sign thee answered said unto evil adulterous generation seeketh sign shall sign given sign prophet jonas jonas wa three day three night whale belly shall son man three day three night spirit wicked enter dwell last state man worse first even shall also unto wicked generation yet talked people behold mother brother stood without desiring speak one said unto behold thy mother thy brother stand without desiring speak thee answered said unto told mother brother stretched forth hand toward disciple said behold mother brother whosoever shall father heaven brother sister mother day went jesus house sat sea side great multitude gathered together unto went ship sat whole multitude stood shore spake many thing unto parable saying behold sower went forth sow sowed seed fell way side fowl came devoured fell upon stony place much earth forthwith sprung deepness earth sun wa scorched root withered away fell among thorn thorn sprung choked fell good ground brought forth fruit hundredfold sixtyfold thirtyfold hath ear hear let hear disciple came said unto speakest thou unto parable answered said unto given unto know mystery kingdom heaven given whosoever hath shall given shall abundance whosoever hath shall taken away even hath therefore speak parable seeing see hearing hear neither understand fulfilled prophecy esaias saith hearing ye shall hear shall understand seeing ye shall see shall perceive people heart waxed gross ear dull hearing eye closed lest time see eye hear ear understand heart converted heal blessed eye see ear hear verily say unto many prophet righteous men desired see thing ye see seen hear thing ye hear heard hear ye therefore parable sower one heareth word kingdom understandeth cometh wicked one catcheth away wa sown heart received seed way side received seed stony place heareth word anon joy receiveth yet hath root dureth tribulation persecution ariseth word offended also received seed among thorn heareth word care world deceitfulness rich choke word becometh unfruitful received seed good ground heareth word understandeth also beareth fruit bringeth forth hundredfold sixty thirty another parable put forth unto saying kingdom heaven likened unto man sowed good seed field men slept enemy came sowed tare among wheat went way blade wa sprung brought forth fruit appeared tare also servant householder came said unto sir didst thou sow good seed thy field whence hath tare said unto enemy hath done servant said unto wilt thou go gather said nay lest ye gather tare ye root also wheat let grow together harvest time harvest say reaper gather ye together first tare bind bundle burn gather wheat barn another parable put forth unto saying kingdom heaven like grain mustard seed man took sowed field indeed least seed grown greatest among herb becometh tree bird air come lodge branch thereof another parable spake unto kingdom heaven like unto leaven woman took hid three measure meal till whole wa leavened thing spake jesus unto multitude parable without parable spake unto might fulfilled wa spoken prophet saying open mouth parable utter thing kept secret foundation world jesus sent multitude away went house disciple came unto saying declare unto u parable tare field answered said unto soweth good seed son man field world good seed child kingdom tare child wicked one enemy sowed devil harvest end world reaper angel therefore tare gathered burned fire shall end world son man shall send forth angel shall gather kingdom thing offend iniquity shall cast furnace fire shall wailing gnashing teeth shall righteous shine forth sun kingdom father hath ear hear let hear kingdom heaven like unto treasure hid field man hath found hideth joy thereof goeth selleth hath buyeth field kingdom heaven like unto merchant man seeking goodly pearl found one pearl great price went sold bought kingdom heaven like unto net wa cast sea gathered every kind wa full drew shore sat gathered good vessel cast bad away shall end world angel shall come forth sever wicked among shall cast furnace fire shall wailing gnashing teeth jesus saith unto ye understood thing say unto yea lord said unto therefore every scribe instructed unto kingdom heaven like unto man householder bringeth forth treasure thing new old came pas jesus finished parable departed thence wa come country taught synagogue insomuch astonished said whence hath man wisdom mighty work carpenter son mother called mary brother james joses simon juda sister u whence hath man thing offended jesus said unto prophet without honour save country house many mighty work unbelief time herod tetrarch heard fame jesus said unto servant john baptist risen dead therefore mighty work shew forth herod laid hold john bound put prison herodias sake brother philip wife john said unto lawful thee would put death feared multitude counted prophet herod birthday wa kept daughter herodias danced pleased herod whereupon promised oath give whatsoever would ask instructed mother said give john baptist head charger king wa sorry nevertheless oath sake sat meat commanded given sent beheaded john prison head wa brought charger given damsel brought mother disciple came took body buried went told jesus jesus heard departed thence ship desert place apart people heard thereof followed foot city jesus went forth saw great multitude wa moved compassion toward healed sick wa evening disciple came saying desert place time past send multitude away may go village buy victual jesus said unto need depart give ye eat say unto five loaf two fish said bring hither commanded multitude sit grass took five loaf two fish looking heaven blessed brake gave loaf disciple disciple multitude eat filled took fragment remained twelve basket full eaten five thousand men beside woman child straightway jesus constrained disciple get ship go unto side sent multitude away sent multitude away went mountain apart pray evening wa come wa alone ship wa midst sea tossed wave wind wa contrary fourth watch night jesus went unto walking sea disciple saw walking sea troubled saying spirit cried fear straightway jesus spake unto saying good cheer afraid peter answered said lord thou bid come unto thee water said come peter wa come ship walked water go jesus saw wind boisterous wa afraid beginning sink cried saying lord save immediately jesus stretched forth hand caught said unto thou little faith wherefore didst thou doubt come ship wind ceased ship came worshipped saying truth thou art son god gone came land gennesaret men place knowledge sent country round brought unto diseased besought might touch hem garment many touched made perfectly whole came jesus scribe pharisee jerusalem saying thy disciple transgress tradition elder wash hand eat bread answered said unto ye also transgress commandment god tradition god commanded saying honour thy father mother curseth father mother let die death ye say whosoever shall say father mother gift whatsoever thou mightest profited honour father mother shall free thus ye made commandment god none effect tradition ye hypocrite well esaias prophesy saying people draweth nigh unto mouth honoureth lip heart far vain worship teaching doctrine commandment men called multitude said unto hear understand goeth mouth defileth man cometh mouth defileth man came disciple said unto knowest thou pharisee offended heard saying answered said every plant heavenly father hath planted shall rooted let alone blind leader blind blind lead blind shall fall ditch answered peter said unto declare unto u parable jesus said ye also yet without understanding ye yet understand whatsoever entereth mouth goeth belly cast draught thing proceed mouth come forth heart defile man heart proceed evil thought murder adultery fornication theft false witness blasphemy thing defile man eat unwashen hand defileth man jesus went thence departed coast tyre sidon behold woman canaan came coast cried unto saying mercy lord thou son david daughter grievously vexed devil answered word disciple came besought saying send away crieth u answered said sent unto lost sheep house israel came worshipped saying lord help pleased immediately spirit driveth wilderness wa wilderness forty day tempted satan wa wild beast angel ministered unto john wa put prison jesus came galilee preaching gospel kingdom god saying time fulfilled kingdom god hand repent ye believe gospel walked sea galilee saw simon andrew brother casting net sea fisher jesus said unto come ye make become fisher men straightway forsook net followed gone little farther thence saw james son zebedee john brother also ship mending net straightway called left father zebedee ship hired servant went went capernaum straightway sabbath day entered synagogue taught astonished doctrine taught one authority scribe wa synagogue man unclean spirit cried saying let u alone thee thou jesus nazareth art thou come destroy u know thee thou art holy one god jesus rebuked saying hold thy peace come unclean spirit torn cried loud voice came amazed insomuch questioned among saying thing new doctrine authority commandeth even unclean spirit obey immediately fame spread abroad throughout region round galilee forthwith come synagogue entered house simon andrew james john simon wife mother lay sick fever anon tell came took hand lifted immediately fever left ministered unto even sun set brought unto diseased possessed devil city wa gathered together door healed many sick diver disease cast many devil suffered devil speak knew morning rising great day went departed solitary place prayed simon followed found said unto men seek thee said unto let u go next town may preach also therefore came forth preached synagogue throughout galilee cast devil came leper beseeching kneeling saying unto thou wilt thou canst make clean jesus moved compassion put forth hand touched saith unto thou clean soon spoken immediately leprosy departed wa cleansed straitly charged forthwith sent away saith unto see thou say nothing man go thy way shew thyself priest offer thy cleansing thing moses commanded testimony unto went began wa room receive much door preached word unto come unto bringing one sick palsy wa borne four could come nigh unto press uncovered roof wa broken let bed wherein sick palsy lay jesus saw faith said unto sick palsy son thy sin forgiven thee wa certain scribe sitting reasoning heart doth man thus speak blasphemy forgive sin god immediately jesus perceived spirit reasoned within said unto reason ye thing heart whether easier say sick palsy thy sin forgiven thee say arise take thy bed walk ye may know son man hath power earth forgive sin saith sick palsy say unto thee arise take thy bed go thy way thine house immediately arose took bed went forth insomuch amazed glorified god saying never saw fashion went forth sea side multitude resorted unto taught passed saw levi son alphaeus sitting answered said unto one twelve dippeth dish son man indeed goeth written woe man son man betrayed good man never born eat jesus took bread blessed brake gave said take eat body took cup given thanks deny thee wise likewise also said came place wa named gethsemane saith disciple sit ye shall pray taketh peter james john began sore amazed heavy saith unto soul exceeding sorrowful unto death tarry ye watch went forward little fell ground prayed possible hour might pas said abba father thing possible unto thee take away cup nevertheless thou wilt cometh findeth sleeping saith unto peter simon sleepest thou couldest thou watch one hour watch ye pray lest ye enter temptation spirit truly ready flesh weak went away prayed spake word returned found asleep eye heavy neither wist answer cometh third time saith unto sleep take rest enough hour come behold son man betrayed hand sinner rise let u go lo betrayeth hand immediately yet spake cometh juda one twelve great multitude sword stave chief priest scribe elder betrayed given token saying whomsoever shall kiss take lead away safely soon wa come goeth straightway saith master master kissed laid hand took one stood drew sword smote naked body young men laid hold left linen cloth fled naked led jesus away high priest assembled chief priest elder scribe peter followed afar even palace high priest sat servant warmed fire chief priest council sought witness jesus put death found none many bare false witness witness agreed together arose certain bare false witness saying heard say destroy temple made hand within three day build another made without hand neither witness agree together high priest stood midst asked jesus saying answerest thou nothing witness thee held peace answered nothing high priest asked said unto art thou christ son blessed jesus said ye shall see son man sitting right hand power coming cloud heaven high priest rent clothes saith need witness ye heard blasphemy think ye condemned guilty death began spit cover face buffet say unto prophesy servant strike palm hand peter wa beneath palace cometh one maid high priest saw peter warming looked upon said thou also wast jesus nazareth denied saying know neither understand thou sayest went porch cock crew maid saw began say stood one denied little stood said peter surely thou art one thou art galilaean thy speech agreeth thereto began curse swear saying know man ye speak second time cock crew peter called mind word jesus said unto cock crow twice thou shalt deny thrice thought thereon wept straightway morning chief priest held whatsoever thou spendest come repay thee three thinkest thou wa neighbour unto fell among thief said shewed mercy said jesus unto go thou likewise came pas went entered certain village certain woman named martha received house sister called mary also sat jesus foot heard word martha wa cumbered much serving came said lord dost thou care sister hath left serve alone bid therefore help jesus answered said unto martha martha thou art careful troubled many thing one thing needful mary hath chosen good part shall taken away came pas wa praying certain place ceased one disciple said unto lord teach u pray john also taught disciple said unto ye pray say father art heaven hallowed thy name thy kingdom come thy done heaven earth give u day day daily bread forgive u sin also forgive every one indebted u lead u temptation deliver u evil said unto shall friend shall go unto midnight say unto friend lend three loaf friend mine journey come nothing set within shall answer say trouble door shut child bed cannot rise give thee say unto though rise give friend yet importunity rise give many needeth say unto ask shall given seek ye shall find knock shall opened unto every one asketh receiveth seeketh findeth knocketh shall opened son shall ask bread father give stone ask fish fish give serpent shall ask egg offer scorpion ye evil know give good gift unto child much shall heavenly father give holy spirit ask wa casting devil wa dumb came pas devil wa gone dumb spake people wondered said casteth devil beelzebub chief devil others tempting sought sign heaven knowing thought said unto every kingdom divided brought desolation house divided house falleth satan also divided shall kingdom stand ye say cast devil beelzebub beelzebub cast devil son cast therefore shall judge finger god cast devil doubt kingdom god come upon strong man armed keepeth palace good peace stronger shall come upon overcome taketh armour wherein trusted divideth spoil gathereth scattereth unclean spirit gone man walketh dry place seeking rest finding none saith return unto house whence came cometh findeth swept garnished goeth taketh seven spirit wicked enter dwell last state man worse first came pas spake thing certain woman company lifted voice said unto blessed womb bare thee pap thou hast sucked said yea rather blessed hear word god keep people gathered thick together began say evil generation seek sign shall sign given sign jonas prophet jonas wa sign unto ninevites shall also son man generation queen south shall rise judgment men generation condemn came utmost part earth hear wisdom solomon behold greater solomon men nineve shall rise judgment generation shall condemn repented preaching jonas behold greater jonas man hath lighted candle putteth secret place neither bushel candlestick come may see light light body eye therefore thine eye single thy whole body also full light thine eye evil thy body also full darkness take heed therefore light thee darkness thy whole body therefore full light part dark whole shall full light bright shining candle doth give thee light spake certain pharisee besought dine went sat meat pharisee saw marvelled first washed dinner lord said unto ye pharisee make clean outside cup platter inward part full ravening wickedness ye fool made without make within also rather give alms thing ye behold thing clean unto woe unto pharisee ye walk aware answered one lawyer said unto master thus saying thou reproachest u also said woe unto also ye lawyer ye lade men burden grievous borne ye touch burden one finger woe unto ye build sepulchre prophet father killed truly ye bear witness ye allow deed father indeed killed ye build sepulchre therefore also said wisdom god send prophet apostle shall slay persecute blood prophet wa shed foundation world may required generation blood abel unto blood zacharias perished altar temple verily say unto shall required generation woe unto lawyer ye taken away key knowledge ye entered multitude people insomuch trode one upon another began say unto disciple first beware ye leaven pharisee hypocrisy nothing covered shall revealed neither hid shall known therefore whatsoever ye spoken darkness shall heard light ye spoken ear closet shall proclaimed upon housetop say unto friend afraid kill body forewarn ye shall fear fear hath killed hath power cast hell yea say unto fear five sparrow sold two farthing one forgotten god even hair head numbered fear therefore ye value many sparrow also say unto whosoever shall confess men shall son man also confess angel god denieth men shall denied angel god whosoever shall speak word son man shall forgiven unto blasphemeth holy ghost shall forgiven bring unto synagogue unto magistrate power take ye thought thing ye shall answer ye shall say holy ghost shall teach hour ye ought say one company said unto master speak brother divide inheritance said unto man made judge divider said unto take heed beware covetousness man life consisteth abundance thing possesseth spake parable unto saying ground certain rich man brought forth plentifully thought within saying shall room bestow fruit said pull barn build greater bestow fruit good say soul soul thou hast much good laid many year take thine ease eat drink merry god said unto thou fool night thy soul shall required thee whose shall thing thou hast provided layeth treasure rich toward god said unto disciple therefore say unto take thought life ye shall eat neither body ye shall put life meat body raiment consider raven neither sow reap neither storehouse barn god feedeth much ye better fowl taking thought add stature one cubit ye able thing least take ye thought rest consider lily grow toil spin yet say unto solomon glory wa arrayed like one god clothe grass day field morrow cast oven much clothe ye little faith seek ye ye shall eat ye shall drink neither ye doubtful mind thing nation world seek father knoweth ye need thing rather seek ye kingdom god thing shall added unto fear little flock father good pleasure give kingdom sell ye give alms provide bag wax old treasure heaven faileth thief approacheth neither moth corrupteth treasure heart dresser vineyard behold three year come seeking fruit fig tree find none cut cumbereth ground answering said unto lord let alone year also till shall dig dung bear fruit well thou shalt cut wa communication ye one another ye walk sad one whose name wa cleopas answering said unto art thou stranger jerusalem hast known thing come pas day said unto thing said unto concerning jesus nazareth wa astonished early sepulchre found body came saying also seen vision angel said wa alive certain u went sepulchre found even woman said saw said unto fool slow heart believe prophet spoken ought christ suffered thing enter glory beginning moses prophet expounded unto scripture thing concerning drew nigh unto village whither went made though would gone constrained saying abide u toward evening day far spent went tarry came pas sat meat took bread blessed brake gave eye opened knew vanished sight said one another heart burn within u talked u way opened u scripture rose hour returned jerusalem found eleven gathered together saying lord risen indeed hath appeared simon told thing done way wa known breaking bread thus spake jesus stood midst saith unto peace unto terrified affrighted supposed seen spirit said unto ye troubled thought arise heart behold hand foot handle see spirit hath flesh bone ye see thus spoken shewed hand foot yet believed joy wondered said unto ye meat gave piece broiled fish honeycomb took eat said unto word spake unto wa yet thing must fulfilled written law moses prophet psalm concerning opened understanding might understand scripture said unto thus written thus behoved christ suffer rise dead third day repentance remission sin preached name among nation beginning jerusalem ye witness thing behold send promise father upon tarry ye city jerusalem ye endued power high led far bethany lifted hand blessed came pas blessed wa parted carried heaven worshipped returned jerusalem great joy continually temple praising blessing god amen gospel according saint john beginning wa word word wa god word wa god wa beginning god thing made without wa thing made wa made wa life life wa light men light shineth darkness darkness comprehended wa man sent god whose name wa john came witness bear witness light men might believe wa light wa sent bear witness light wa true light lighteth every man cometh world wa world world wa made world knew came unto received many received gave power become son god even believe name born blood flesh man god word wa made flesh dwelt among u beheld glory glory begotten father full grace truth john bare witness cried saying wa spake cometh preferred wa fulness received grace grace law wa given moses grace truth came jesus christ man hath seen god time begotten son bosom father hath declared record john jew sent priest levite jerusalem ask art thou confessed denied confessed christ asked art thou elia saith art thou prophet answered said unto art thou may give answer sent u sayest thou thyself said voice one cry wilderness make straight way lord said prophet esaias sent pharisee asked said unto baptizest thou thou christ elia neither prophet john answered saying baptize water standeth one among ye know man preferred wa knew made manifest israel therefore come baptizing water john bare record saying saw spirit descending heaven like dove abode upon knew sent baptize water said unto upon thou shalt see spirit descending remaining baptizeth holy ghost saw bare record son god next day john stood two disciple looking upon jesus walked saith behold lamb god two disciple heard speak followed jesus andrew simon peter brother first findeth brother simon saith unto found messias interpreted christ brought jesus jesus beheld said thou art simon son jona thou shalt called cephas interpretation stone day following jesus would go forth galilee findeth philip saith unto follow philip wa bethsaida city andrew peter philip findeth nathanael saith unto found moses law prophet write jesus nazareth son said unto philip called thee thou wast fig tree saw thee nathanael answered saith unto rabbi thou art son god thou art king israel jesus answered said unto said unto thee saw thee fig tree believest purifying jew containing two three firkin apiece jesus saith unto fill waterpots water filled brim saith unto draw bear unto governor feast bare ruler feast tasted water wa made wine knew whence wa
