unto verily verily say unto thee except man born cannot see kingdom god nicodemus saith unto man born old enter second time mother womb born jesus answered verily verily say unto thee except man born water spirit cannot enter kingdom god born flesh flesh born spirit spirit marvel said unto thee ye must born wind bloweth listeth thou hearest sound thereof canst tell whence cometh whither goeth every one born spirit nicodemus answered said unto thing jesus answered said unto art thou master israel knowest thing verily verily say unto thee speak know testify seen ye receive witness told earthly thing ye believe shall ye believe tell heavenly thing man hath ascended heaven came heaven even son man heaven moses lifted serpent wilderness even must son man lifted whosoever believeth perish eternal life god loved world gave begotten son whosoever believeth perish everlasting life god sent son world condemn world world might saved believeth condemned believeth condemned already hath believed name begotten son god condemnation light come world men loved darkness rather light deed evil every one doeth evil hateth light neither cometh light lest deed reproved doeth truth cometh light deed may made manifest wrought god thing came jesus disciple land judaea tarried baptized john also wa baptizing aenon near salim wa much water came baptized john wa yet cast prison arose question john disciple jew purifying came unto john said unto rabbi wa thee beyond jordan thou barest witness behold baptizeth men come john answered said man receive nothing except given heaven ye bear witness said christ sent hath bride bridegroom friend bridegroom standeth heareth rejoiceth greatly bridegroom voice joy therefore fulfilled must increase must decrease cometh earth earthly speaketh earth cometh heaven hath seen heard testifieth man receiveth testimony hath received testimony hath set seal god true god hath sent speaketh word god god giveth spirit measure unto father loveth son hath given thing hand believeth son hath everlasting life believeth son shall see life wrath god abideth therefore lord knew pharisee heard jesus made baptized disciple john though jesus baptized disciple left judaea departed galilee must need go samaria cometh city samaria called sychar near parcel ground jacob gave son joseph jacob well wa jesus therefore wearied journey sat thus well wa sixth hour cometh woman samaria draw water jesus saith unto give drink disciple gone away unto city buy meat saith woman samaria unto thou jew askest drink woman samaria jew dealing samaritan jesus answered said unto thou knewest gift god saith thee give drink thou wouldest asked would given thee living water woman saith unto sir thou hast nothing draw well deep whence hast thou living water art thou greater father jacob gave u well drank thereof child cattle jesus answered said unto whosoever drinketh water shall thirst whosoever drinketh water shall give shall never thirst water shall give shall well water springing everlasting life woman saith unto sir give water thirst neither come hither draw jesus saith unto go call thy husband come hither woman answered said husband jesus said unto thou hast well said husband thou hast five husband thou hast thy husband saidst thou truly woman saith unto sir perceive thou art prophet father worshipped mountain ye say jerusalem place men ought worship jesus saith unto woman believe hour cometh ye shall neither mountain yet jerusalem worship father ye worship ye know know worship salvation jew hour cometh true worshipper shall worship father spirit truth father seeketh worship god spirit worship must worship spirit truth woman saith unto know messias cometh called christ come tell u thing jesus saith unto speak unto thee upon came disciple marvelled talked woman yet man said seekest thou talkest thou woman left waterpot went way city saith men come see man told thing ever christ went city came unto mean disciple prayed saying master eat said unto meat eat ye know therefore said disciple one another hath man brought ought eat jesus saith unto meat sent finish work say ye yet four month cometh harvest behold say unto lift eye look field white already harvest reapeth receiveth wage gathereth fruit unto life eternal soweth reapeth may rejoice together herein saying true one soweth another reapeth sent reap unto woman believe thy saying heard know indeed christ saviour world two day departed thence went galilee jesus testified prophet hath honour country wa come galilee galilaean received seen thing knew long time case saith unto wilt thou made whole impotent man answered sir man water troubled put pool coming another steppeth jesus saith unto rise take thy bed walk immediately man wa made whole took bed walked day wa sabbath jew therefore said unto wa cured sabbath day lawful thee carry thy bed answered made whole said unto take thy bed walk asked man said unto thee take thy bed walk wa healed wist wa jesus conveyed away multitude place afterward jesus findeth temple said unto behold thou art made whole sin lest worse thing come unto thee man departed told jew wa jesus made whole therefore jew persecute jesus sought slay done thing sabbath day jesus answered father worketh hitherto work therefore jew sought kill broken sabbath said also god wa father making equal god answered jesus said unto verily verily say unto son nothing seeth father thing soever doeth also doeth son likewise father loveth son sheweth thing doeth shew greater work ye may marvel father raiseth dead quickeneth even son quickeneth father judgeth man hath committed judgment unto son men honour son even honour father honoureth son honoureth father hath sent verily verily say unto heareth word believeth sent hath everlasting life shall come condemnation passed death unto life verily verily say unto hour coming dead shall hear voice son god hear shall live father hath life hath given son life hath given authority execute judgment also son man marvel hour coming graf shall hear voice shall come forth done good unto resurrection life done evil unto resurrection damnation mine self nothing hear judge judgment seek mine father hath sent bear witness witness true another beareth witness know witness witnesseth true ye sent unto john bare witness unto truth receive testimony man thing say ye might saved wa burning shining light ye willing season rejoice light greater witness john work father hath given finish work bear witness father hath sent father hath sent hath borne sea entered ship went sea toward capernaum wa dark jesus wa come sea arose reason great wind blew rowed five twenty thirty furlong see jesus walking sea drawing nigh unto ship afraid saith unto afraid willingly received ship immediately ship wa land whither went day following people stood side sea saw wa none boat save one whereinto disciple entered jesus went disciple boat disciple gone away alone howbeit came boat tiberias nigh unto place eat bread lord given thanks people therefore saw jesus wa neither disciple also took shipping came capernaum seeking jesus found side sea said unto rabbi camest thou hither jesus answered said verily verily say unto ye seek ye saw miracle ye eat loaf filled labour meat perisheth meat endureth unto everlasting life son man shall give unto hath god father sealed said unto shall might work work god jesus answered said unto work god ye believe hath sent said therefore unto sign shewest thou may see believe thee dost thou work father eat manna desert written gave bread heaven eat jesus said unto verily verily say unto moses gave bread heaven father giveth true bread heaven bread god cometh heaven giveth life unto world said unto lord evermore give u bread jesus said unto bread life cometh shall never hunger believeth shall never thirst said unto ye also seen believe father giveth shall come cometh wise cast came heaven mine sent father hath sent hath given lose nothing raise last day sent every one seeth son believeth may everlasting life raise last day jew murmured said bread came heaven said jesus son joseph whose father mother know saith came heaven jesus therefore answered said unto murmur among man come except father hath sent draw raise last day written prophet shall taught god every man therefore hath heard hath eat thereof die living bread came heaven man eat bread shall live ever bread give flesh give life world jew therefore strove among saying man give u flesh eat jesus said unto verily verily say unto except ye eat flesh son man drink blood ye life whoso eateth flesh drinketh blood hath eternal life raise last day flesh meat indeed blood drink indeed eateth flesh drinketh blood dwelleth living unto abode still galilee brother gone went also unto feast openly secret jew sought feast said wa much murmuring among people concerning said good man others said nay deceiveth people howbeit man might abundantly good shepherd good shepherd giveth life sheep hireling shepherd whose sheep seeth wolf coming leaveth sheep fleeth wolf catcheth scattereth sheep hireling fleeth hireling careth sheep master jew late sought stone thee goest thou thither jesus answered twelve hour day man walk day stumbleth seeth light world man walk night stumbleth light thing said saith unto friend lazarus came martha mary comfort concerning brother martha soon heard jesus wa coming went met mary sat still house said martha unto jesus lord thou hadst brother died know even whatsoever thou wilt ask god god give thee jesus saith unto thy brother shall rise martha saith unto know shall rise resurrection last day jesus said unto resurrection life believeth though dead yet shall live whosoever liveth believeth shall never die believest thou saith unto yea lord believe thou art christ son god come world said went way called mary sister secretly saying master come calleth thee soon heard arose quickly came unto jesus wa yet come town wa place martha met jew house comforted saw mary rose hastily went followed saying goeth unto grave weep mary wa come jesus wa saw fell foot saying unto lord thou hadst brother died jesus therefore saw weeping jew also weeping came groaned spirit wa troubled said ye laid said unto lord come see jesus wept said jew behold loved said could man opened eye blind caused even man died jesus therefore groaning cometh grave wa cave stone lay upon jesus said take ye away stone martha sister wa dead saith unto lord time stinketh hath dead four day jesus saith raised dead bare record cause people also met heard done miracle pharisee therefore said among perceive ye ye prevail nothing behold world gone certain greek among came worship feast came therefore philip wa bethsaida galilee desired saying sir would see jesus philip cometh telleth andrew andrew philip tell jesus jesus answered saying hour come son man glorified verily verily say unto except corn wheat fall ground die abideth alone die bringeth forth much fruit loveth life shall lose hateth life world shall keep unto life eternal man serve let follow shall also servant man serve father honour soul troubled shall say father save hour cause came unto hour father glorify thy name came voice heaven saying glorified glorify people therefore stood heard said thundered others said angel spake jesus answered said voice came sake judgment world shall prince world cast lifted earth draw men unto said signifying death die people answered heard law christ abideth ever sayest thou son man must lifted son man jesus said unto yet little light walk ye light lest darkness come upon walketh darkness knoweth whither goeth ye light believe light ye may child light thing spake jesus departed hide though done many miracle yet believed saying esaias prophet might fulfilled spake lord hath believed report hath arm lord revealed therefore could believe esaias said hath blinded eye hardened heart see eye understand heart converted heal thing said esaias saw glory spake nevertheless among chief ruler also many believed pharisee confess lest put synagogue loved praise men praise god jesus cried said believeth believeth sent seeth seeth sent come light world whosoever believeth abide darkness man hear word believe judge came judge world save world rejecteth receiveth word hath one judgeth word spoken shall judge last day spoken father sent gave commandment say speak know commandment life everlasting whatsoever speak therefore even father said unto speak feast passover jesus knew hour wa come depart world unto father loved world loved unto end supper ended devil put heart juda iscariot simon son betray jesus knowing father given thing hand wa come god went god riseth supper laid aside garment took towel girded poureth water bason began wash disciple foot wipe towel wherewith wa girded cometh simon peter peter saith unto lord dost thou wash foot jesus answered said unto thou knowest thou shalt know hereafter peter saith unto thou shalt never wash foot jesus answered wash thee thou hast part simon peter saith unto lord foot also hand head jesus saith washed needeth save wash foot clean every whit ye clean knew betray therefore said ye clean washed foot taken garment wa set said unto know ye done ye call master lord ye say well lord master washed foot ye also ought wash one another foot given example ye done verily verily say unto servant greater lord neither sent greater sent ye know thing happy ye ye speak know chosen scripture may fulfilled eateth bread hath lifted heel tell come come pas ye may believe verily verily say unto receiveth whomsoever send receiveth receiveth receiveth sent jesus thus said wa troubled spirit testified said verily verily say unto one shall betray disciple looked one another doubting spake wa leaning jesus bosom one disciple jesus loved simon peter therefore beckoned ask spake lying jesus breast saith unto lord jesus answered shall give sop dipped dipped sop gave juda iscariot son simon sop satan entered said jesus unto thou doest quickly man table knew intent spake unto thought juda bag jesus said unto buy thing need feast give something poor received sop went immediately wa night therefore wa gone jesus said son man glorified god glorified god glorified god shall also glorify shall straightway glorify little child yet little ye shall seek said unto jew whither go ye cannot come say new commandment give unto ye love one another loved ye also love one another shall men know ye disciple ye love one another simon peter said unto lord whither goest thou jesus answered whither go thou canst follow thou shalt follow afterwards peter said unto lord cannot follow thee lay life thy sake jesus answered wilt thou lay thy life sake verily verily say unto thee cock shall crow till thou hast denied thrice let heart troubled ye believe god believe also father house many mansion would told go prepare place go prepare place come receive unto ye may also whither go ye know way ye know thomas saith unto lord know whither thou goest know way jesus saith unto way truth life man cometh unto father ye known ye known father also henceforth ye know seen philip saith unto lord shew u father sufficeth u jesus saith unto long time yet hast thou known philip hath seen hath seen father sayest thou shew u father believest thou father father word speak unto speak father dwelleth doeth work believe father father else believe work sake verily verily say unto believeth work shall also greater work shall go unto father whatsoever ye shall ask name father may glorified son ye shall ask thing name ye love keep commandment pray father shall give another comforter may abide ever even spirit truth world cannot receive seeth neither knoweth ye know dwelleth shall leave comfortless come yet little world seeth ye see live ye shall live also day ye shall know father ye hath commandment keepeth loveth loveth shall loved father love manifest juda saith unto iscariot lord thou wilt manifest thyself unto u unto world jesus answered said unto man love keep word father love come unto make abode loveth keepeth saying word ye hear mine father sent thing spoken unto yet present comforter holy ghost father send name shall teach thing bring thing remembrance whatsoever said unto peace leave peace give unto world giveth give unto let heart troubled neither let afraid ye heard said unto go away come unto ye loved ye would rejoice said go unto father father greater told come pas come pas ye might believe hereafter talk much prince world cometh hath nothing world may know love father father gave commandment even arise let u go hence true vine father husbandman every branch beareth fruit taketh away every branch beareth fruit purgeth may bring forth fruit ye clean word spoken unto abide branch cannot bear fruit except abide vine ye except ye abide vine ye branch abideth bringeth forth much fruit without ye nothing man abide cast forth branch withered men gather cast fire burned ye abide word abide ye shall ask ye shall done unto herein father glorified ye bear much fruit shall ye disciple father hath loved loved continue ye love ye keep commandment ye shall abide love even kept father commandment abide love thing spoken unto joy might remain joy might full commandment ye love chosen chosen ordained ye go bring forth fruit fruit remain whatsoever ye shall ask father name may give thing command ye love one another world hate ye know hated hated ye world world would love ye hateth hateth father also done among work none man sin seen hated father cometh pas word might fulfilled written law hated without cause comforter come send unto father even spirit truth proceedeth came caesarea saul yet breathing threatenings slaughter disciple lord went unto high priest desired letter damascus synagogue found way whether men woman might bring bound unto jerusalem journeyed came near damascus suddenly shined round light heaven fell earth heard voice saying unto saul saul persecutest thou said art thou lord lord said jesus thou persecutest hard thee kick prick trembling astonished said lord wilt thou lord said unto arise go city shall told thee thou must men journeyed stood speechless hearing voice seeing man saul arose earth eye opened saw man led hand brought damascus wa three day without sight neither eat drink wa certain disciple damascus named ananias said lord vision ananias said behold lord lord said unto arise go street called straight enquire house juda one called saul tarsus behold prayeth hath seen vision man named ananias coming putting hand might receive sight ananias answered lord heard many man much evil hath done thy saint jerusalem hath authority chief priest bind call thy name lord said unto go thy way chosen vessel unto bear name gentile king child israel shew great thing must suffer name sake ananias went way entered house putting hand said brother saul lord even jesus appeared unto thee way thou camest hath sent thou mightest receive thy sight filled holy ghost immediately fell eye scale received sight forthwith arose wa baptized received meat wa strengthened wa saul certain day disciple damascus straightway preached christ synagogue son god heard amazed said destroyed called name jerusalem came hither intent might bring bound unto chief priest saul increased strength confounded jew dwelt damascus proving christ many day fulfilled jew took counsel kill laying await wa known saul watched gate day night kill disciple took night let wall basket saul wa come jerusalem assayed join disciple afraid believed wa disciple barnabas took brought apostle declared unto seen lord way spoken preached boldly damascus name jesus wa coming going jerusalem spake boldly name lord jesus disputed grecian went slay brother knew brought caesarea sent forth tarsus church rest throughout judaea galilee samaria edified walking fear lord comfort holy ghost multiplied came pas peter passed throughout quarter came also saint dwelt lydda found certain man named aeneas kept bed eight year wa sick palsy peter said unto aeneas jesus christ maketh thee whole arise make thy bed arose immediately dwelt lydda saron saw turned lord wa joppa certain disciple named tabitha interpretation called dorcas woman wa full good work almsdeeds came pas day wa sick died washed laid upper chamber forasmuch lydda wa nigh joppa disciple heard peter wa sent unto two men desiring would delay come peter arose went wa come brought upper chamber widow stood weeping shewing coat garment dorcas made wa peter put forth kneeled prayed turning body said tabitha arise opened eye saw peter sat gave hand lifted called saint widow presented alive wa known throughout joppa many believed lord came pas tarried many day joppa one simon tanner wa certain man caesarea called cornelius centurion band called italian band devout man one feared god house gave much alms people prayed god alway saw vision evidently ninth hour day angel god coming saying unto cornelius looked wa afraid said lord said unto thy prayer thine alms come memorial god send men joppa call one simon whose surname peter lodgeth one simon tanner whose house sea side shall tell thee thou oughtest angel spake unto cornelius wa departed called two household servant devout soldier waited continually declared thing unto sent joppa morrow went journey drew nigh unto city peter went upon housetop pray sixth hour became hungry would eaten made ready fell trance saw heaven opened certain vessel descending upon great sheet knit four corner let earth wherein manner fourfooted beast earth wild beast creeping thing fowl air came voice rise peter kill eat peter said lord never eaten thing common unclean voice spake unto second time god hath cleansed call thou common wa done thrice vessel wa received heaven peter doubted vision seen mean behold men sent cornelius made enquiry simon house stood gate called asked whether simon wa surnamed peter lodged peter thought vision spirit said unto behold three men seek thee arise therefore get thee go doubting nothing sent peter went men sent unto cornelius said behold ye seek cause wherefore ye come said cornelius centurion man one feareth god good report among nation jew wa warned god holy angel send thee house hear word thee called lodged morrow peter went away certain brother joppa accompanied morrow entered caesarea cornelius waited called together kinsman near friend peter wa coming cornelius met fell foot worshipped peter took saying stand also man talked went found many come together said unto ye know unlawful thing man jew keep company come unto one another nation god hath shewed call man common unclean therefore came unto without gainsaying soon wa sent ask therefore intent ye sent cornelius said four day ago wa fasting hour ninth hour prayed house behold man stood bright clothing said cornelius thy prayer heard thine alms remembrance sight god send therefore joppa call hither simon whose surname peter lodged house one simon tanner sea side cometh shall speak unto thee immediately therefore sent thee thou hast well done thou art come therefore present god hear thing commanded thee god peter opened mouth said truth perceive god respecter person every nation feareth worketh righteousness accepted word god sent unto child israel preaching peace jesus christ lord word say ye know wa published throughout judaea began galilee baptism john preached god anointed jesus nazareth holy ghost power went good healing oppressed devil god wa witness thing land jew jerusalem slew hanged tree god raised third day shewed openly people unto witness chosen god even u eat drink rose dead commanded u preach unto people testify wa ordained god judge quick dead give prophet witness name whosoever believeth shall receive remission sin peter yet spake word holy ghost fell heard hath cleansed call thou common wa done three time drawn heaven behold immediately three men already come unto house wa sent caesarea unto spirit bade go nothing doubting moreover six brother hand vex certain church killed james brother john sword saw pleased jew proceeded take peter also day unleavened bread apprehended put prison delivered four quaternion soldier keep intending easter bring forth people peter therefore wa kept prison prayer wa made without ceasing church unto god herod would brought forth night peter wa sleeping two soldier bound two chain keeper door kept prison behold angel lord came upon light shined prison smote peter side raised saying arise quickly chain fell hand angel said unto gird thyself bind thy sandal saith unto cast thy garment thee follow went followed wist wa true wa done angel thought saw vision past first second ward came unto iron gate leadeth unto city opened accord went passed one street forthwith angel departed peter wa come said know surety lord hath sent angel hath delivered hand herod expectation people jew considered thing came house mary mother john whose surname wa mark many gathered together praying peter knocked door god wrought among gentile ministry heard glorified lord said unto thou seest brother many thousand jew believe zealous law informed thee thou teachest jew among gentile forsake moses saying ought circumcise child neither walk custom therefore multitude must need come together hear thou art come therefore say thee four men vow take purify thyself charge may shave head may know thing whereof informed concerning thee nothing thou thyself also walkest orderly keepest law touching gentile believe written concluded observe thing save keep thing offered idol blood strangled fornication paul took men next day purifying entered temple signify accomplishment day purification offering offered every one seven day almost ended jew asia saw temple stirred people laid hand cry men israel help murderer paul said man jew tarsus city cilicia citizen mean city beseech thee suffer speak unto people given licence paul stood stair beckoned hand unto people wa made great silence spake unto hebrew manner law father wa zealous toward god ye day persecuted way unto death binding delivering prison men woman also high priest doth bear witness estate elder also received letter unto brother went damascus bring bound unto jerusalem punished came pas made journey wa come nigh unto damascus noon suddenly shone heaven great light round fell unto ground heard voice saying unto saul saul persecutest thou answered art thou lord said unto jesus nazareth thou persecutest saw indeed light afraid heard voice spake said shall lord lord said unto arise go damascus shall told thee thing appointed thee could see glory light led hand came damascus one ananias devout man according law good report jew dwelt came unto stood said unto brother saul receive thy sight hour looked upon said god father hath chosen thee thou shouldest know see one shouldest hear voice mouth thou shalt witness unto men thou hast seen heard tarriest thou arise baptized wash away thy sin calling name lord came pas wa come jerusalem even prayed temple wa trance saw saying unto make haste get thee quickly jerusalem receive thy testimony concerning said lord know imprisoned beat every synagogue believed thee blood thy martyr stephen wa shed also wa standing consenting unto death kept raiment slew said unto depart send thee far hence unto gentile gave audience unto word lifted voice said away fellow earth fit live cried cast clothes threw dust air chief captain commanded brought castle bade examined scourging might know wherefore cried bound thong paul said unto centurion stood lawful scourge man roman uncondemned centurion heard went told chief captain saying take heed thou doest man roman chief captain came said unto tell art thou roman said yea chief captain answered great sum obtained freedom paul said wa free born straightway departed examined chief captain also wa afraid knew wa roman bound morrow would known certainty wherefore wa accused jew loosed band commanded chief priest council appear brought paul set paul earnestly beholding council said men brother lived good conscience god day high priest ananias commanded stood smite mouth said paul unto god shall smite thee thou whited wall sittest thou judge law commandest smitten contrary law stood said revilest thou god high priest said paul wist brother wa high priest written thou shalt speak evil ruler thy people paul perceived one part sadducee pharisee cried council men brother pharisee son pharisee hope resurrection dead called question said arose dissension pharisee sadducee multitude wa divided sadducee say
